translated: He demonstrates the subjugation of Mara in order to show the weakness and powerlessness caused by the power of the afflictions, in order to show the roots of virtue, and in order to show the power of love.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa dag tu chos nyid rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa dag tu chos nyid rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to follow the nature of reality in the infinite world systems of affliction,

original: byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston to //
translated: the bodhisattva demonstrates the subjugation of Mara.

analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: “O Son of the Victorious One!

original: don bcu po de dag gi dbang mngon pas na /
analyzed: don bcu po de dag gi dbang mngon pas na /
translated: Through the power of these ten meanings,

original: byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston to //
translated: the bodhisattva demonstrates the subjugation of Mara.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O Son of the Victorious One!

original: bcu po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po 'di dag ni /
translated: These ten are

original: @5b byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ste /
analyzed: @5b byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ste /
translated: The bodhisattvas’ manifest, perfect enlightenment is the tathagata’s power.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O son of the victorious ones!

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdud dang / las dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad las 'das shing /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdud dang / las dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad las 'das shing /
translated: The bodhisattvas have transcended all demons, karma, and afflictions,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin /
translated: and they have perfected all bodhisattva conduct.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la rnam par rtse ba yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la rnam par rtse ba yin /
translated: They are skilled in all the bodhisattva’s doors of samadhi.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan 'byams klas pa thams cad dang ldan pa yin /🔽chos dkar po'i tshogs thams cad yang dag par bsags pa yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan 'byams klas pa thams cad dang ldan pa yin / chos dkar po'i tshogs thams cad yang dag par bsags pa yin /
translated: They possess all the bodhisattva’s boundless concentrations.🔽They have perfectly accumulated all the accumulations of virtuous dharmas.

original: chos snang ba rnam par dpyad par bya ba thams cad shin tu rnam par phye ba yin /
analyzed: chos snang ba rnam par dpyad par bya ba thams cad shin tu rnam par phye ba yin /
translated: They have thoroughly distinguished all the dharmas that are to be analyzed with the light of Dharma.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i lus dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i lus dang ldan pa yin /
translated: They possess bodies that pervade all world systems.

original: sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems dang / dbyangs su ldan pa yin /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems dang / dbyangs su ldan pa yin /
translated: They have a mind that is impartial toward all sentient beings and they have a melodious voice.

original: byin gyi rlabs thams cad kyis rab mchog por byin gyis brlabs pa yin /
analyzed: byin gyi rlabs thams cad kyis rab mchog por byin gyis brlabs pa yin /
translated: They are blessed with the highest of all blessings.

original: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rnam par mi rtog pa thob pa yin /
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rnam par mi rtog pa thob pa yin /
translated: They have attained the nonconceptual state of the body, speech, and mind of all the thus-gone ones of the past, present, and future.

original: skad cig gcig gis dus gsum rnam par 'tshang rgya ba yin /
analyzed: skad cig gcig gis dus gsum rnam par 'tshang rgya ba yin /
translated: They are enlightened in the three times in a single instant.

original: shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin kyang rab tu thob pa yin /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin kyang rab tu thob pa yin /
translated: They have attained the absorption known as ‘utterly awakened.’

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin te /🔽'di ltar gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i @6a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin te / 'di ltar gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i @6a *//
translated: They possess the power of the thus-gone ones.

original: stobs dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: stobs dang ldan pa yin /
translated: They possess the power of what is possible and what is impossible.

original: zag pa zad pa shes pa'i bar gyi stobs dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: zag pa zad pa shes pa'i bar gyi stobs dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: They possess the power of the exhaustion of defilements.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O Son of Noble Family!

original: bcu po de dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po de dag ni /
translated: These are the ten powers.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ste /
translated: It is the bodhisattvas’ perfect buddhahood of the powers of the tathagatas.

original: stobs bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni /
analyzed: stobs bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni /
translated: The tathagatas who possess these ten powers

original: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o //
translated: are counted as tathagatas.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: “O son of the conquerors,

original: de ltar mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni /
analyzed: de ltar mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni /
translated: in this way, the tathagata, the arhat, the perfectly enlightened buddha,

original: chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rnam pa bcu bskor te /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rnam pa bcu bskor te /
translated: having attained manifest enlightenment, turns the great wheel of the Dharma in ten aspects.

original: rnam pa bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten aspects?

original: 'di ltar mi 'jigs pas shin tu sbyangs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa dang / tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa bzhi'i sgra rjes su bsgrags pa dang / bden pa bzhi'i tshul gyis shin tu brtags pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa med pa'i rjes su song ba dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar mi 'jigs pas shin tu sbyangs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa dang / tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa bzhi'i sgra rjes su bsgrags pa dang / bden pa bzhi'i tshul gyis shin tu brtags pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa med pa'i rjes su song ba dang /
translated: They are as follows: the wisdom of complete purification endowed with fearlessness, the proclamation of the sound of the four kinds of correct understanding, the thorough investigation by means of the four truths, the attainment of the tathagata’s ten powers, the realization of the tathagata’s four forms of fearlessness, the attainment of the tathagata’s four forms of exact knowledge, the attainment of the tathagata’s great compassion, the attainment of the tathagata’s eighteen distinctive qualities, the attainment of the tathagata’s complete purification of the field, and the attainment of the tathagata’s complete purification of the body.

original: sems can thams cad kyi sems dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / thogs pa med cing blta bar dka' la yo ba med cing /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi sems dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / thogs pa med cing blta bar dka' la yo ba med cing /
translated: the minds of all sentient beings are delighted, there is no obstruction, it is difficult to see, it is unwavering,

original: sdug bsngal gyi gsal shing 'byin pa dang; sngon gyi snying rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du grags pa dang / bskal pa grangs med par chos ston pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / @6b dbang po dang /
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi gsal shing 'byin pa dang; sngon gyi snying rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du grags pa dang / bskal pa grangs med par chos ston pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / @6b dbang po dang /
translated: it removes the stake of suffering, it is the blessing of previous great compassion, it is renowned in all world systems, it is the uninterrupted teaching of the Dharma for countless eons, and it is surrounded by the faculties,🔽the powers, the branches of enlightenment, the concentrations, the liberations, the samādhis, the absorptions, and good conduct.

original: stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / legs par spyad pas bskor ba'o; ;kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / legs par spyad pas bskor ba'o; ;kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O Son of the Victorious One!

original: sgo rnam pa bcu po de dag la sogs pa rnam pa tshad med pa de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro //
analyzed: sgo rnam pa bcu po de dag la sogs pa rnam pa tshad med pa de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro //
translated: The Tathāgata turns the wheel of the Dharma with these ten aspects and countless other aspects.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O Son of the Victorious One!

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo de ni sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la chos dkar po'i rnam pa bcus thogs pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo de ni sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la chos dkar po'i rnam pa bcus thogs pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: The wheel of Dharma of the tathāgatas, the saints, the perfectly enlightened ones, is unimpeded and unattached in the mind-streams of other sentient beings through ten aspects of virtuous qualities.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: 'di ltar smon lam thams cad kyi stobs kyi shugs dang / snying rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad mi gtong ba dang / ye shes kyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar smon lam thams cad kyi stobs kyi shugs dang / snying rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad mi gtong ba dang / ye shes kyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang /
translated: They are as follows: the power of all aspirations, the blessing of great compassion, not abandoning the realm of sentient beings, the display of wisdom in accordance with the thoughts of sentient beings,

original: dus la bab par thob par byed pa dang / rigs pa'i tshul bzhin du mi 'khrul ba dang / dus gsum shes par bya ba rab tu rtogs pa dang / lus kyi dbang zil gyis mi non pa dang / tshig gi dbang dmigs par dka' ba dang /
analyzed: dus la bab par thob par byed pa dang / rigs pa'i tshul bzhin du mi 'khrul ba dang / dus gsum shes par bya ba rab tu rtogs pa dang / lus kyi dbang zil gyis mi non pa dang / tshig gi dbang dmigs par dka' ba dang /
translated: the attainment of the right time, the non-deception in accordance with the method, the realization of the knowledge of the three times, the supremacy of the power of the body, the difficulty of observing the power of speech,🔽and the non-deception of the power of mind.

original: ye shes kyi dbang tshig bzhin du khong du chud par byed pa ste /
analyzed: ye shes kyi dbang tshig bzhin du khong du chud par byed pa ste /
translated: and the wisdom empowerment is to be understood according to the words.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: “O Son of the Victorious Ones!

original: chos dkar po'i rnam pa bcu po de dag gis /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs @7a *//
analyzed: chos dkar po'i rnam pa bcu po de dag gis / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs @7a *//
translated: Through these ten aspects of pure phenomena,🔽the wheel of Dharma of the thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas becomes unobstructed and manifest in the mind streams of other beings.

original: pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la thogs pa med pa dang / mngon par med par 'gyur bar 'gyur ro; ;kye rgyal ba'i sras /🔽sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rdzogs par mdzad zin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni don bcu'i dbang gzigs nas /
analyzed: pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la thogs pa med pa dang / mngon par med par 'gyur bar 'gyur ro; ;kye rgyal ba'i sras / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rdzogs par mdzad zin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni don bcu'i dbang gzigs nas /
translated: O Son of the Victorious Ones!

original: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po ston te /
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po ston te /
translated: The thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas, whose activity as buddhas is complete, teach the great transcendence of suffering after seeing the significance of ten topics.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are these ten?

original: 'di ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'du byed mi rtag pa yongs su bstan pa dang / 'dus byas thams cad yid brtan du mi rung bar bstan pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyogs bde bar 'gro bas 'jigs pa dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'du byed mi rtag pa yongs su bstan pa dang / 'dus byas thams cad yid brtan du mi rung bar bstan pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyogs bde bar 'gro bas 'jigs pa dang /
translated: He taught the impermanence of conditioned phenomena just as it is, the unreliability of all conditioned things, and the way to the happiness of the transcendence of suffering.

original: bag tsha ba thams cad dang 'bral ba yang dag par bstan pa dang / gzugs kyi lus la zhen pa'i lha dang mi rnams la gzugs kyi lus mi rtag pa nyid du yang dag par bstan pa dang / chos kyi sku la yang dag par sbyar ba dang /
analyzed: bag tsha ba thams cad dang 'bral ba yang dag par bstan pa dang / gzugs kyi lus la zhen pa'i lha dang mi rnams la gzugs kyi lus mi rtag pa nyid du yang dag par bstan pa dang / chos kyi sku la yang dag par sbyar ba dang /
translated: He taught the freedom from all fear and anxiety, the impermanence of the physical bodies of gods and humans who are attached to their physical bodies, and the way to the dharmakāya.

original: rnam par 'gyur ba'i mthus phyir mi ldog par yongs su bstan pa dang / 'du byed thams cad 'dod dgur mi rung zhing dbang bsgyur du med pa yongs su bstan pa dang / sa gsum gyi 'khor ba thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bur yongs su bstan pa dang /
analyzed: rnam par 'gyur ba'i mthus phyir mi ldog par yongs su bstan pa dang / 'du byed thams cad 'dod dgur mi rung zhing dbang bsgyur du med pa yongs su bstan pa dang / sa gsum gyi 'khor ba thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bur yongs su bstan pa dang /
translated: He taught the irreversible nature of the body of transformation, the unreliability of all conditioned things, and the illusory nature of the three realms of saṃsāra.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa ni snying po dam pa ste /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa ni snying po dam pa ste /
translated: Nirvana is the highest essence.🔽It is taught to be the nature of fearlessness,🔽the teaching of the separation from the arising of fear,

original: mi 'jigs pa'i chos nyid du yang dag par bstan pa @7b dang; kun 'byung zhing 'jigs pas 'bral bar 'gyur ba yongs su bstan pa dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa'i chos nyid du yang dag par bstan pa @7b dang; kun 'byung zhing 'jigs pas 'bral bar 'gyur ba yongs su bstan pa dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O Son of the Victorious Ones,

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos nyid kyis kyang de bzhin te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos nyid kyis kyang de bzhin te /
translated: it is the same for the nature of the Blessed Buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad rdzogs par mdzad de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad rdzogs par mdzad de /
translated: They have completed all the activities of the Buddha.

original: dgongs pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu bskor te /
analyzed: dgongs pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu bskor te /
translated: They have fulfilled all their intentions and have turned the wheel of the Dharma.

original: 'dul ba thams cad shin tu dul nas /
analyzed: 'dul ba thams cad shin tu dul nas /
translated: They have completely tamed all those to be tamed.

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad shin tu lung bstan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad shin tu lung bstan par 'gyur te /
translated: They have given prophecies to all bodhisattvas.

original: mnyam pa med pa'i go 'phang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen por yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa med pa'i go 'phang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen por yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o //
translated: They have attained the unequaled state and have passed into the great nirvana.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras; don bcu po de dag yang dag par gzigs nas /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras; don bcu po de dag yang dag par gzigs nas /
translated: O Son of the Victorious Ones, having seen these ten points,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyam pa med pa'i go 'phang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yongs su ston to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyam pa med pa'i go 'phang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yongs su ston to //
translated: They reveal the level of the tathāgatas, the arhats, the perfectly enlightened buddhas, the unequaled, the great parinirvāṇa.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: “O son of the victors!

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo ste /
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo ste /
translated: This is the Dharma gateway called the purification of the bodhisattvas’ conduct.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang pos gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang pos gsungs pa'o //
translated: It has been taught by many perfectly awakened buddhas.

original: don tshad med pa khong du chud par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: don tshad med pa khong du chud par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: It leads to the understanding of immeasurable meaning.

original: mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa'o //
translated: It delights the wise.

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / smon lam chen po rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / smon lam chen po rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa'o //
translated: It makes the great conduct and aspirations of all bodhisattvas uninterrupted.

original: sems can gang gis 'di thos par gyur te /
analyzed: sems can gang gis 'di thos par gyur te /
translated: Any being who hears this🔽and, having heard it, aspires to it

original: thos nas kyang mos par byed pa dang / mos par gyur nas kyang nan @8a *//
analyzed: thos nas kyang mos par byed pa dang / mos par gyur nas kyang nan @8a *//
translated: and, having aspired to it, makes effort

original: tan gyis yang dag par bsgrub pa de dag thams cad myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro; ;kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: tan gyis yang dag par bsgrub pa de dag thams cad myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro; ;kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: All of them will quickly and fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect buddhahood.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: O Son of the Victorious Ones, why is this?

original: byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' nan tan lhur byed pa rnams kyis 'grub kyi /
analyzed: byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' nan tan lhur byed pa rnams kyis 'grub kyi /
translated: Awakening is accomplished by bodhisattvas who are diligent,

original: nan tan dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis ma yin no //
analyzed: nan tan dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis ma yin no //
translated: not by those who are not diligent.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O Son of the Victorious Ones,

original: de lta bas na /
analyzed: de lta bas na /
translated: therefore,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nan tan la gnas pas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nan tan la gnas pas /
translated: the bodhisattva mahasattva who abides in diligence

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / yon tan gyi 'byung gnas /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / yon tan gyi 'byung gnas /
translated: should study the chapter on the door of the supramundane Dharma, the source of the bodhisattva's conduct and qualities,

original: don rnam par gdon mi za ba'i me tog /
analyzed: don rnam par gdon mi za ba'i me tog /
translated: the flower that undoubtedly reveals the meaning,

original: chos kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba /
analyzed: chos kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba /
translated: which is truly directed towards all Dharma doors,

original: ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug pa /
analyzed: ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug pa /
translated: which is the entrance to the door of wisdom,

original: 'jig rten gyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa /
translated: which is truly beyond all worldly paths,

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba /
translated: It is free from the paths of all śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: 'gro ba thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa /
translated: It is not shared in common with any beings.

original: chos thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa /
translated: It illuminates the doors to all phenomena.

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'di /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'di /
translated: It increases the roots of virtue of all beings, both mundane and supramundane.

original: rim gror byas te /
analyzed: rim gror byas te /
translated: You should serve it,

original: mnyan par bya'o //🔽blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: mnyan par bya'o // blang bar bya'o //
translated: listen to it,🔽accept it,

original: yongs su gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: yongs su gzung bar bya'o //
translated: and uphold it.

original: yongs su bzung nas kyang nges pas rtogs pa'i sgos yongs su sbyang ba dang / smon lam mngon par bsgrub @8b pa la brtson par bya'o //
analyzed: yongs su bzung nas kyang nges pas rtogs pa'i sgos yongs su sbyang ba dang / smon lam mngon par bsgrub @8b pa la brtson par bya'o //
translated: Having accepted and upheld it, you should strive to purify it through the realization of certainty and to accomplish the prayers.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: “O son of the victors!

original: de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni /
analyzed: de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni /
translated: For bodhisattvas who strive in this way,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dkon pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dkon pa ma yin no //
translated: unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment is not difficult to attain.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u chos thams cad kyi sgor yang dag par gzhol ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u chos thams cad kyi sgor yang dag par gzhol ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe /
translated: When this Dharma discourse, the chapter on the gateway to the supramundane Dharma, was taught,

original: sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i chos nyid thob pas /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i chos nyid thob pas /
translated: through the Buddha's power and the natural law of this Dharma discourse,

original: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa rnams rab tu g-yos par gyur to //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa rnams rab tu g-yos par gyur to //
translated: the immeasurable and countless world systems in the ten directions shook.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams g-yos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos rgyas shing gsal bar gyur to //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams g-yos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos rgyas shing gsal bar gyur to //
translated: All those world systems that shook were filled with a great light.

original: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang dgyes par gyur te /
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang dgyes par gyur te /
translated: The blessed buddhas in the ten directions were delighted.

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la zhal bstan nas gsung brjod pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la zhal bstan nas gsung brjod pa /
translated: They revealed their faces to the bodhisattva Samantabhadra and spoke:

original: kye rgyal ba'i bu /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i bu /
translated: Oh son of the victors!

original: legs so // legs so //
analyzed: legs so // legs so //
translated: Excellent, excellent!

original: ji ltar khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la /
analyzed: ji ltar khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la /
translated: Just as you have taught the bodhisattva mahasattvas,

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / yon tan gyi 'byung gnas don rnam par gdon mi za ba'i me tog chos kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag gzhol ba /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / yon tan gyi 'byung gnas don rnam par gdon mi za ba'i me tog chos kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag gzhol ba /
translated: the chapter on the gateway to the Dharma that transcends the world, the bodhisattva conduct, and the source of qualities, the flower of the definitive meaning, which is the gateway to all Dharmas,

original: ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug pa; 'jig rten gyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba /
analyzed: ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug pa; 'jig rten gyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba /
translated: the gateway to wisdom, which is beyond all worldly paths and free from the paths of all śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas,

original: 'gro ba thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa /
translated: which is not shared in common with any beings,

original: @9a *// chos thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa /
analyzed: @9a *// chos thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa /
translated: which illuminates the gateway to all Dharmas,🔽and which increases the roots of virtue of all beings, both worldly and beyond the world.

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'di bstan pa ni rgyal ba'i bu khyod chos 'di dag la legs par bslabs pas shin tu byang ba ste /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'di bstan pa ni rgyal ba'i bu khyod chos 'di dag la legs par bslabs pas shin tu byang ba ste /
translated: “Son of noble family, you have trained well in these Dharmas and have become very skilled in them.

original: rgyal ba'i bu khyod kyis chos kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / mthus mos pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bshad de /
analyzed: rgyal ba'i bu khyod kyis chos kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / mthus mos pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bshad de /
translated: “Son of the victors, you have explained this Dharma discourse on aspiration well through the blessing and power of the Dharma.

original: nged kyis kyang mngon par bsngags so //
analyzed: nged kyis kyang mngon par bsngags so //
translated: We also praise it.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang mngon par bsngags so //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang mngon par bsngags so //
translated: All the thus-gone ones also praise it.

original: kye rgyal ba'i bu /🔽khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma thos pa'i chos thos par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i bu / khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma thos pa'i chos thos par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: O son of the victors!

original: nged kyis byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //
analyzed: nged kyis byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //
translated: We have blessed you to enable you to teach this Dharma discourse so that present and future bodhisattvas may hear the Dharma they have not yet heard.🔽”

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur bltas te /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur bltas te /
translated: Then the bodhisattva great being Samantabhadra, through the blessing of the Buddha, looked in the ten directions,

original: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la bltas nas chos kyi dbyings thams cad la bltas te /
analyzed: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la bltas nas chos kyi dbyings thams cad la bltas te /
translated: looked at the entire assembly, and looked at the entire realm of phenomena.

original: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
analyzed: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
translated: At that time, he spoke these verses:

original: gang rnams de dag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong du brtul zhugs dka' spyad pa //
analyzed: gang rnams de dag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong du brtul zhugs dka' spyad pa //
translated: “Those who for quintillions of eons have practiced austerities,

original: gang rnams de dag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong las byung ba'i chos kyi sras //
analyzed: gang rnams de dag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong las byung ba'i chos kyi sras //
translated: Those who are the spiritual heirs of the buddhas,

original: gang rnams de dag sems can bye ba khrag khrig stong rnams byang chub rab 'god pa //
analyzed: gang rnams de dag sems can bye ba khrag khrig stong rnams byang chub rab 'god pa //
translated: Those who establish quintillions of beings in enlightenment,

original: dpe @9b zla med pa de dag rnams kyi spyod pa bshad kyi rtse cig mnyan par byos //
analyzed: dpe @9b zla med pa de dag rnams kyi spyod pa bshad kyi rtse cig mnyan par byos //
translated: “Those who are incomparable, their conduct I will explain, so listen single-pointedly.

original: gang dag sangs rgyas khrag khrig mtha' yas mchod kyang bdag ni sangs rgyas mi gnas pa //
analyzed: gang dag sangs rgyas khrag khrig mtha' yas mchod kyang bdag ni sangs rgyas mi gnas pa //
translated: “Those who make offerings to infinite quintillions of buddhas but do not dwell on buddhahood,🔽Those who liberate beings who are bound by the afflictions but do not dwell on the perception of beings,

original: gang dag nyon mongs bcings pa'i 'gro ba thar byed sems can 'du shes mi gnas dang // gang rnams de dag sangs rgyas yon tan rtag tu tshol yang yon tan mi gnas pa //
analyzed: gang dag nyon mongs bcings pa'i 'gro ba thar byed sems can 'du shes mi gnas dang // gang rnams de dag sangs rgyas yon tan rtag tu tshol yang yon tan mi gnas pa //
translated: Those who always seek the qualities of buddhahood but do not dwell on those qualities,

original: de dag 'jig rten rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i spyod mchog mdzes pa brjod par bya //
analyzed: de dag 'jig rten rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i spyod mchog mdzes pa brjod par bya //
translated: “I will describe their beautiful, supreme conduct, which delights the world.”

original: gang rnams de dag srid pa gsum na las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi dbang song snang //
analyzed: gang rnams de dag srid pa gsum na las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi dbang song snang //
translated: Those who are under the power of karma, kleśas, and the māras in the three existences,

original: gang rnams de dag 'phags pa'i yon tan ldan zhing khyu mchog spyod pa ston pa po //
analyzed: gang rnams de dag 'phags pa'i yon tan ldan zhing khyu mchog spyod pa ston pa po //
translated: Those who are endowed with the qualities of the āryas and demonstrate the conduct of the bull,

original: gang rnams de dag gti mug nyon mongs nyes bral bsam pa zhi zhing rab zhi ba //
analyzed: gang rnams de dag gti mug nyon mongs nyes bral bsam pa zhi zhing rab zhi ba //
translated: Those who are free from the afflictions of delusion and error, with peaceful and tranquil intentions,🔽I will describe the qualities of those who demonstrate the stages of conduct for beings.

original: 'gro ba rnams la spyod pa'i rim pa ston pa de dag yon tan brjod par bya; ;gang rnams de dag bdud g-yo 'gro ba kun las brgal te thams cad dbang byed pa //
analyzed: 'gro ba rnams la spyod pa'i rim pa ston pa de dag yon tan brjod par bya; ;gang rnams de dag bdud g-yo 'gro ba kun las brgal te thams cad dbang byed pa //
translated: Those who have transcended all the deceptions of Māra and have power over everything,

original: 'gro ba thams cad dag la sprul pa sna tshogs tha dad mtha' yas rab tu ston //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad dag la sprul pa sna tshogs tha dad mtha' yas rab tu ston //
translated: Who demonstrate the infinite variety of emanations to all beings,

original: sems bskyed gyur ma thag tu gnas dang 'jig pa'i bya ba thams cad ston byed pa //
analyzed: sems bskyed gyur ma thag tu gnas dang 'jig pa'i bya ba thams cad ston byed pa //
translated: Who demonstrate all the activities of abiding and destruction as soon as the thought arises,

original: de dag yon tan sna tshogs mdzes pa sems can dga' bar byed pa brjod par bya //
analyzed: de dag yon tan sna tshogs mdzes pa sems can dga' bar byed pa brjod par bya //
translated: I will describe their beautiful and various qualities that delight sentient beings.

original: srid pa'i rgyud na sems can sdug bsngal nyen cing skye dang rga bas gzir ba dang // 'chi dang mya ngan dag gis gtses shing gnod byas nyon mongs kun tu gzir mthong nas //🔽de dag thar bar bya phyir @10a *//
analyzed: srid pa'i rgyud na sems can sdug bsngal nyen cing skye dang rga bas gzir ba dang // 'chi dang mya ngan dag gis gtses shing gnod byas nyon mongs kun tu gzir mthong nas // de dag thar bar bya phyir @10a *//
translated: and afflicted by grief and pain,🔽they generate great compassion

original: snying rje rgya chen bskyed nas ye shes mchog 'god pa //
analyzed: snying rje rgya chen bskyed nas ye shes mchog 'god pa //
translated: and set out for the highest wisdom.

original: de dag yon tan shin tu dge ba phyogs tsam bshad kyi rtse cig mnyan par byos //
analyzed: de dag yon tan shin tu dge ba phyogs tsam bshad kyi rtse cig mnyan par byos //
translated: Listen single-pointedly as I explain a mere fraction of their extremely virtuous qualities.

original: sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dga' bar bsam gtan la yang rnam par rtsen //
analyzed: sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dga' bar bsam gtan la yang rnam par rtsen //
translated: They delight in generosity, discipline, patience, diligence, and meditation,🔽and they perfect wisdom and skillful means, love, compassion, and the superior intention.

original: shes rab thabs kyi pha rol phyin cing byams dang snying rje lhag pa'i bsam pa dang // dga' ba'i chos la brtson zhing btang snyoms dga' bas bskal pa brgyar yang spyod spyad pa //
analyzed: shes rab thabs kyi pha rol phyin cing byams dang snying rje lhag pa'i bsam pa dang // dga' ba'i chos la brtson zhing btang snyoms dga' bas bskal pa brgyar yang spyod spyad pa //
translated: They practice the joyful Dharma and equanimity for a hundred eons.

original: de dag spyod ldan yon tan ldan pa rnams kyi yon tan bstan gyi de dag nyon //
analyzed: de dag spyod ldan yon tan ldan pa rnams kyi yon tan bstan gyi de dag nyon //
translated: Listen to the explanation of the qualities of those who possess conduct and virtue.

original: gang rnams de dag byang chub gnyer phyir bye ba khrag khrig stong gi lus skem pa //
analyzed: gang rnams de dag byang chub gnyer phyir bye ba khrag khrig stong gi lus skem pa //
translated: Those who, for the sake of enlightenment, dry up their bodies in the trillions,🔽Those who, for the sake of the peace of enlightenment, have no regard for their lives,

original: gang rnams byang chub zhi ba tshol phyir srog la lta ba med par gyur pa dang // gang rnams de dag sems can phan phyir rtag brtson bdag gi bde ba mi tshol ba //
analyzed: gang rnams byang chub zhi ba tshol phyir srog la lta ba med par gyur pa dang // gang rnams de dag sems can phan phyir rtag brtson bdag gi bde ba mi tshol ba //
translated: Those who, for the sake of benefiting beings, are always diligent and do not seek their own happiness,

original: byams dang snying rje'i sems ldan thub pa de dag kun gyi spyod mchog brjod par bya //
analyzed: byams dang snying rje'i sems ldan thub pa de dag kun gyi spyod mchog brjod par bya //
translated: I will proclaim the supreme conduct of all those sages who have loving and compassionate minds.

original: rgya mtsho'i chu thigs bgrangs pa re res thams cad zad par bya bar rung srid kyi //
analyzed: rgya mtsho'i chu thigs bgrangs pa re res thams cad zad par bya bar rung srid kyi //
translated: It is possible that every drop of water in the ocean could be counted, one by one,

original: de dag yon tan bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig du ma stong du brjod byas kyang //
analyzed: de dag yon tan bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig du ma stong du brjod byas kyang //
translated: But even in many quintillions of eons,

original: dpe tsam bya bar mi nus legs par brjod cing bstan par mi nus 'on kyang go /
analyzed: dpe tsam bya bar mi nus legs par brjod cing bstan par mi nus 'on kyang go /
translated: It would not be possible to give an example, or to describe or teach🔽Even a little of the qualities of those who have the supreme conduct.

original: sems can phan pa'i don du sangs rgyas yul rnams bstan par bya ba mnyan par byos //
analyzed: sems can phan pa'i don du sangs rgyas yul rnams bstan par bya ba mnyan par byos //
translated: Nevertheless, for the benefit of beings, I will teach the realms of the buddhas. Listen!

original: gang dag 'gro ba rnams kyi don phyir dge ba kun 'dzin dkar @10b po 'phel byed kyang //
analyzed: gang dag 'gro ba rnams kyi don phyir dge ba kun 'dzin dkar @10b po 'phel byed kyang //
translated: They are the ones who, for the sake of beings, gather all that is virtuous and increase the wholesome.

original: mtho bar mi sems dma' bar sems med mi dman chos tshol ngoms par yong mi 'gyur //
analyzed: mtho bar mi sems dma' bar sems med mi dman chos tshol ngoms par yong mi 'gyur //
translated: They do not think of themselves as superior or inferior, and they are never satisfied with their pursuit of the Dharma.

original: 'gro ba kun nas don gnyer chu klung ye shes mtsho chen shes rab shing sdong ste //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun nas don gnyer chu klung ye shes mtsho chen shes rab shing sdong ste //
translated: They are the ones who, for the sake of all beings, are the rivers, the great ocean of wisdom, and the tree of insight.

original: ston pa'i mkhas pa de dag rnams ni sa ltar 'gro ba thams cad 'tsho ba yin //
analyzed: ston pa'i mkhas pa de dag rnams ni sa ltar 'gro ba thams cad 'tsho ba yin //
translated: Those wise teachers are the ones who, like the earth, sustain all beings.

original: byams pa rlan yin snying rje rtsa ba dga' ba sdong po brtan pa sdom pa ste //🔽ze ba ye shes dri ni tshul khrims bzang po lo ma me tog yon tan can //
analyzed: byams pa rlan yin snying rje rtsa ba dga' ba sdong po brtan pa sdom pa ste // ze ba ye shes dri ni tshul khrims bzang po lo ma me tog yon tan can //
translated: Love is their moisture, compassion their root, joy their trunk, and steadfastness their branches.🔽Their anthers are wisdom, their fragrance is excellent discipline, and their leaves are the qualities.

original: sangs rgyas 'od kyis rab tu rgyas byas blo gros ldan pa sems can dga' byed pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'od kyis rab tu rgyas byas blo gros ldan pa sems can dga' byed pa //
translated: Their flowers are the light of the buddhas, and their fruit is the delight of the wise.

original: de dang de dag padmo lta bur 'dus byas ma gos 'gro ba rnams la snang //
analyzed: de dang de dag padmo lta bur 'dus byas ma gos 'gro ba rnams la snang //
translated: They are the ones who, like lotuses, are unstained by the conditioned and shine upon beings.

original: sa bon mos pa sa gzhi bsam pa byams dang snying rje dang ni rtsa ba ste //
analyzed: sa bon mos pa sa gzhi bsam pa byams dang snying rje dang ni rtsa ba ste //
translated: Their seed is interest, the ground is their intention, and love and compassion are their roots.

original: sdong po shes rab thabs ni yal ga lcug ma dag ni pha rol phyin rab lnga //
analyzed: sdong po shes rab thabs ni yal ga lcug ma dag ni pha rol phyin rab lnga //
translated: The trunk is wisdom, the branches and twigs are the five perfections of means.

original: bsam gtan shes rab mngon shes me tog rgyas pa kun mkhyen ye shes 'bras bu ste //
analyzed: bsam gtan shes rab mngon shes me tog rgyas pa kun mkhyen ye shes 'bras bu ste //
translated: Meditation and wisdom are the blossoming flowers, and omniscient wisdom is the fruit.

original: chos kyi shing mchog rdzu 'phrul bya 'khod de dang des ni 'jig rten gsum po khebs //
analyzed: chos kyi shing mchog rdzu 'phrul bya 'khod de dang des ni 'jig rten gsum po khebs //
translated: The tree of Dharma, with its miraculous birds, covers the three worlds.

original: rim gyis dkar yangs yongs su spel ba lus yin bden pa rnams ni rkang pa ste //
analyzed: rim gyis dkar yangs yongs su spel ba lus yin bden pa rnams ni rkang pa ste //
translated: The gradual increase of the white [element] is the body, and the truths are the feet.

original: dran pa mgrin pa spyod mchog shes rab mgo yin ral pa rnam par grol ba dge /
analyzed: dran pa mgrin pa spyod mchog shes rab mgo yin ral pa rnam par grol ba dge /
translated: The throat is mindfulness, the head is the supreme conduct of wisdom, and the hair is the virtue of liberation.

original: stong pa don dam sul dang phug yin byams dang snying rje dag ni mig gnyis te //
analyzed: stong pa don dam sul dang phug yin byams dang snying rje dag ni mig gnyis te //
translated: The caves and clefts are the ultimate emptiness, and love and compassion are the two eyes.

original: de dag seng ge lta bur bdag med sgra 'byin bdud sde rab tu skrag par byed //
analyzed: de dag seng ge lta bur bdag med sgra 'byin bdud sde rab tu skrag par byed //
translated: They roar the sound of selflessness like a lion, terrifying the hordes of demons.

original: 'gro ba ma lus rnams ni 'khor ba'i 'brog @11a *//
analyzed: 'gro ba ma lus rnams ni 'khor ba'i 'brog @11a *//
translated: All beings wander in the wilderness of saṃsāra,

original: dgon nyon mongs mi bzad 'khyams gyur te //
analyzed: dgon nyon mongs mi bzad 'khyams gyur te //
translated: Wandering in the unbearable afflictions of the wilderness.

original: bdud kyi bya ma rta dang rkun por bcas pas zin cing gti mug mdongs gyur pa //
analyzed: bdud kyi bya ma rta dang rkun por bcas pas zin cing gti mug mdongs gyur pa //
translated: They are seized by the horse of the māras, thieves, and the blind darkness of ignorance.

original: lam ni rab stor mi mkhas sems can mthong nas ded dpon mkhas pa de dag ni //
analyzed: lam ni rab stor mi mkhas sems can mthong nas ded dpon mkhas pa de dag ni //
translated: Seeing that beings have lost the path and are unskilled, those wise guides

original: lam gyi mthar khrid 'jigs pa med pa'i grong khyer dam pa mchog la rab tu 'god //
analyzed: lam gyi mthar khrid 'jigs pa med pa'i grong khyer dam pa mchog la rab tu 'god //
translated: Lead them to the end of the path and establish them in the supreme, excellent city of fearlessness.

original: 'gro ba dag ni 'dod chags zhe sdang mun pa nyon mongs sna tshogs nad btab cing //
analyzed: 'gro ba dag ni 'dod chags zhe sdang mun pa nyon mongs sna tshogs nad btab cing //
translated: Beings are afflicted by desire, anger, darkness, and various afflictive emotions.

original: yun ring nas ni 'dus byas sdug bsngal dag la gzhol zhing sdug bsngal rab 'bar ba //
analyzed: yun ring nas ni 'dus byas sdug bsngal dag la gzhol zhing sdug bsngal rab 'bar ba //
translated: For a long time, they are engaged in the suffering of conditioned existence, burning with suffering.

original: sems can mthong nas snying rje bskyed de nyon mongs pa yi nad pa kun gso zhing //
analyzed: sems can mthong nas snying rje bskyed de nyon mongs pa yi nad pa kun gso zhing //
translated: Seeing beings, they generate compassion and heal all those who are sick with afflictive emotions.

original: nad rnams zhi bar byed pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dam pa dag kyang ston //
analyzed: nad rnams zhi bar byed pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dam pa dag kyang ston //
translated: They also teach the excellent methods for pacifying the eighty-four thousand afflictions.

original: rgyal po lta bu de dang de dag 'khor rnams dgar byed 'gro la chos ston pa //
analyzed: rgyal po lta bu de dang de dag 'khor rnams dgar byed 'gro la chos ston pa //
translated: Like kings, they delight their retinues and teach the Dharma to beings.

original: sdig pa spong la dge la bsnyen cing sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyang tshol cig ces //
analyzed: sdig pa spong la dge la bsnyen cing sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyang tshol cig ces //
translated: “Abandon evil, practice virtue, and seek the qualities of the Buddha.”

original: rkang gnyis dbang po'i chos kyi yul la kun mkhyen ye shes dbang por dbang bskur ba //
analyzed: rkang gnyis dbang po'i chos kyi yul la kun mkhyen ye shes dbang por dbang bskur ba //
translated: The lords of the two-legged beings, who have been consecrated with the eye of omniscient wisdom in the field of the Dharma,

original: rgya chen byang chub yan lag rin chen 'byung gnas de dag 'gro ba'i 'phags pa'i nor //
analyzed: rgya chen byang chub yan lag rin chen 'byung gnas de dag 'gro ba'i 'phags pa'i nor //
translated: Are the source of the jewels of the branches of enlightenment, the wealth of the noble ones of the world.

original: tshul khrims lte ba ting 'dzin mu khyud brgyan pa'i ye shes 'od dang shes rab mtshon //
analyzed: tshul khrims lte ba ting 'dzin mu khyud brgyan pa'i ye shes 'od dang shes rab mtshon //
translated: With morality as the hub, concentration as the rim, and wisdom as the spokes,

original: ye shes rno ba'i gzhu can nyon mongs 'joms zhing bdud kyi sde rnams dkrug byed pa //
analyzed: ye shes rno ba'i gzhu can nyon mongs 'joms zhing bdud kyi sde rnams dkrug byed pa //
translated: They wield the sharp bow of wisdom, destroy the afflictions, and disturb the armies of Mara.

original: chos kyi sgron ma che 'byin mchog rnams de dang de dag sangs rgyas bskor ba yin //
analyzed: chos kyi sgron ma che 'byin mchog rnams de dang de dag sangs rgyas bskor ba yin //
translated: Those supreme ones who emit the great light of the Dharma are the retinue of the Buddhas.

original: 'khor lo mchog rnams @11b bskor zhing pha rol rgol ba dag dang mu stegs thams cad 'joms //
analyzed: 'khor lo mchog rnams @11b bskor zhing pha rol rgol ba dag dang mu stegs thams cad 'joms //
translated: They turn the supreme wheel and conquer opponents and all non-Buddhists.

original: ye shes chu ni zab cing mi zad shin tu rgya chen chos kyi ro dang ldan //
analyzed: ye shes chu ni zab cing mi zad shin tu rgya chen chos kyi ro dang ldan //
translated: The water of wisdom is deep, inexhaustible, and vast, with the taste of the Dharma.

original: byang chub yan lag de bzhin bsam gtan rin chen gang ba 'gro kun shes par dka'//
analyzed: byang chub yan lag de bzhin bsam gtan rin chen gang ba 'gro kun shes par dka'//
translated: The branches of enlightenment, likewise, are the precious jewels of concentration, difficult for all beings to know.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas kyi mtha' rlabs mtha' yas yul rnams dag cing lhag bsam dge /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas kyi mtha' rlabs mtha' yas yul rnams dag cing lhag bsam dge /
translated: The infinite waves of the ocean of omniscience are pure objects, with the highest intention for virtue.

original: de dang de dag ye shes rgya mtsho mtshungs med bstan pas zad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dang de dag ye shes rgya mtsho mtshungs med bstan pas zad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Those who are like an ocean of wisdom, with incomparable teachings, will not be exhausted.

original: 'jig rten rab 'phags rtag tu yul gyis mi gos 'gro ba rnams kyi gnas gyur pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten rab 'phags rtag tu yul gyis mi gos 'gro ba rnams kyi gnas gyur pa //
translated: Always superior to the world, never stained by objects, they become the support for all beings.

original: bsam gtan mngon shes rab 'phel ye shes rtse mo lhag pa'i bsam pa mi sgul ba //
analyzed: bsam gtan mngon shes rab 'phel ye shes rtse mo lhag pa'i bsam pa mi sgul ba //
translated: With concentration, higher knowledge, and increasing wisdom, the peak of wisdom is unshakable.

original: gang dag de dang nyer phrad shes rab ye shes mchog gis rab tu 'dra bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gang dag de dang nyer phrad shes rab ye shes mchog gis rab tu 'dra bar 'gyur //
translated: Those who approach them become like them, with supreme wisdom and knowledge.

original: de dang de dag yon tan ri rab shes rab rab brtan 'gro ba kun gyis bltas //
analyzed: de dang de dag yon tan ri rab shes rab rab brtan 'gro ba kun gyis bltas //
translated: Those who are like Mount Meru of qualities, with stable wisdom, are seen by all beings.

original: lhag pa'i bsam pa mchog ni rdo rje mtshungs shing 'dra ste brtul zhugs thams cad brtan //
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pa mchog ni rdo rje mtshungs shing 'dra ste brtul zhugs thams cad brtan //
translated: The highest intention is like a vajra, equal and firm in all disciplines.

original: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod yas bsam pa mi phyed de //
analyzed: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod yas bsam pa mi phyed de //
translated: The Buddha, the Dharma, and the Saṅgha are the three jewels.🔽The three jewels are unshakable, like Mount Meru,

original: bdud dang sems can nyon mongs 'jig rten rlung dag gis ni mi bskyod rab brtan pa //
analyzed: bdud dang sems can nyon mongs 'jig rten rlung dag gis ni mi bskyod rab brtan pa //
translated: because they are not moved by the māras, the afflictions of sentient beings, or the winds of the world.

original: de dang de dag 'jig rten dam pa nyon mongs 'bar ba dag las zlog par byed //
analyzed: de dang de dag 'jig rten dam pa nyon mongs 'bar ba dag las zlog par byed //
translated: They are the highest in the world, and they turn away from the blazing afflictions.

original: byams pa'i sprin rnams kun 'dus snying rje stug po rig pa'i glog chen rgyu zhing ldog /
analyzed: byams pa'i sprin rnams kun 'dus snying rje stug po rig pa'i glog chen rgyu zhing ldog /
translated: The clouds of love gather, and the great lightning of wisdom flashes from the thick clouds of compassion.

original: thub pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gnas bzhi dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra 'byin cing rab tu sgrog /🔽tha dad yang dag shes dang @12a *//
analyzed: thub pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gnas bzhi dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra 'byin cing rab tu sgrog / tha dad yang dag shes dang @12a *//
translated: The sages, abiding in the four bases of miraculous power, roar with the thunder of their voices.

original: tshul khrims yan lag brgyad ldan chu yi char 'bebs pa //
analyzed: tshul khrims yan lag brgyad ldan chu yi char 'bebs pa //
translated: They rain down the water of the eight branches of the noble path🔽and the water of the eightfold noble path.

original: de dang de dag sprin chen nyon mongs zhi byed sems can don phyir mngon par 'phags //
analyzed: de dang de dag sprin chen nyon mongs zhi byed sems can don phyir mngon par 'phags //
translated: They are the great clouds that pacify the afflictions, and they manifest for the sake of sentient beings.

original: shes rab dga' dang khrel yod dag ni 'obs te chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng //
analyzed: shes rab dga' dang khrel yod dag ni 'obs te chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng //
translated: They are the moats of wisdom, joy, and conscience, and they raise the victory banner of the Dharma.

original: ye shes shing thags yin te thar pa'i sgo phye dran pa de dag sgo ba yin //
analyzed: ye shes shing thags yin te thar pa'i sgo phye dran pa de dag sgo ba yin //
translated: Wisdom is the net; mindfulness is the gatekeeper.

original: bden pa rnams ni lam chen bzhi ste shin tu dge ba'i rdzu 'phrul rab brgyan pa //
analyzed: bden pa rnams ni lam chen bzhi ste shin tu dge ba'i rdzu 'phrul rab brgyan pa //
translated: The four noble truths are the four great roads, well adorned with the magic of virtue.

original: srid pa gsum na bdud sde dag gis mi thul grong khyer chos nyid dag tu ston //
analyzed: srid pa gsum na bdud sde dag gis mi thul grong khyer chos nyid dag tu ston //
translated: In the three worlds, the demon hordes cannot conquer the city that teaches the nature of phenomena.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems mchog shing la rab 'dug rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i rkang pa brtan //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems mchog shing la rab 'dug rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i rkang pa brtan //
translated: The supreme mind of omniscience is the tree; the bases of miraculous power are the firm roots.

original: gshog pa thabs kyi stobs te pha rol gnon mthu byams dang snying rje mig gnyis yin //
analyzed: gshog pa thabs kyi stobs te pha rol gnon mthu byams dang snying rje mig gnyis yin //
translated: Skillful means are the wings; the strength of spiritual powers is the ability to reach the other side; love and compassion are the two eyes.

original: ston pa de dag 'gro ba kun na thub med mkha' lding dbang po'i drag shul 'dra //
analyzed: ston pa de dag 'gro ba kun na thub med mkha' lding dbang po'i drag shul 'dra //
translated: Those teachers are like the king of garuḍas, unrivaled in all worlds.

original: srid pa'i mtsho nas 'don cing lha mi rnams kyang mya ngan 'da' ba'i mchog la 'god //
analyzed: srid pa'i mtsho nas 'don cing lha mi rnams kyang mya ngan 'da' ba'i mchog la 'god //
translated: They rescue from the ocean of existence and establish gods and humans in the supreme nirvāṇa.

original: tshul khrims dkyil 'khor rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i shugs ldan ye shes 'od zer phreng ba mdzes //
analyzed: tshul khrims dkyil 'khor rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i shugs ldan ye shes 'od zer phreng ba mdzes //
translated: The mandala of discipline has the power of the bases of miraculous power; the garland of the light rays of wisdom is beautiful.

original: 'od snang kun 'char nyon mongs 'joms shing srid pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu skem par byed //
analyzed: 'od snang kun 'char nyon mongs 'joms shing srid pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu skem par byed //
translated: The light of the sun of the Dharma appears in the world, destroying the afflictions, drying up the ocean of existence,

original: stobs dang dbang po dge ba'i sman 'phel sems can padmo yongs su rgyas byed pa //
analyzed: stobs dang dbang po dge ba'i sman 'phel sems can padmo yongs su rgyas byed pa //
translated: increasing the power of the roots of virtue, and causing the lotus of beings to blossom.

original: de dang de dag snang byed chos kyi nyi ma'i khyu mchog 'gro ba kun du 'byung //
analyzed: de dang de dag snang byed chos kyi nyi ma'i khyu mchog 'gro ba kun du 'byung //
translated: The sun of the Dharma appears in the world, illuminating everything, and the supreme vehicle is revealed.

original: chos dbyings rnam par dag pa dkyil 'khor 'gro ba kun gyis blta na @12b mdzes pa ste //
analyzed: chos dbyings rnam par dag pa dkyil 'khor 'gro ba kun gyis blta na @12b mdzes pa ste //
translated: The pure realm of phenomena is a beautiful maṇḍala for all beings to behold,

original: nyan thos rang rgyal rnams kyi tshogs mang skar ma 'dra ba dag ni zil gyis mnan //
analyzed: nyan thos rang rgyal rnams kyi tshogs mang skar ma 'dra ba dag ni zil gyis mnan //
translated: outshining the many stars of the assemblies of śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: sems kyi rgyud rnams mthong nas srid pa gsum du 'phel dang 'grib pa rnam par stan //
analyzed: sems kyi rgyud rnams mthong nas srid pa gsum du 'phel dang 'grib pa rnam par stan //
translated: Seeing the continuum of mind, the increase and decrease in the three existences is revealed.

original: de dang de dag ye shes zla ba 'gro la 'char zhing mkhas pa nam mkha'i mtha'//
analyzed: de dang de dag ye shes zla ba 'gro la 'char zhing mkhas pa nam mkha'i mtha'//
translated: The moon of wisdom appears in the world for the wise, extending to the ends of space.

original: chos kyi dbang po 'gro ba kun la dbang byed gzugs dang yon tan dag gis brgyan //
analyzed: chos kyi dbang po 'gro ba kun la dbang byed gzugs dang yon tan dag gis brgyan //
translated: The lord of the Dharma rules over all beings, adorned with form and qualities.

original: ye shes rdo rje mnga' ba thabs ni mig ste chos la dbang chen bsgyur gnas pa //
analyzed: ye shes rdo rje mnga' ba thabs ni mig ste chos la dbang chen bsgyur gnas pa //
translated: The eye of method, the vajra of pristine consciousness, is the great power over phenomena.

original: lus dang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs kun gyis blta ba'i dbang po ste //
analyzed: lus dang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs kun gyis blta ba'i dbang po ste //
translated: The eye of the various bodies, marks, and signs is the eye of the Dharma.

original: chos kyis 'gro ba kun las rgyal ba de dang de dag chos kyi dbang po yin //
analyzed: chos kyis 'gro ba kun las rgyal ba de dang de dag chos kyi dbang po yin //
translated: The eye of the Dharma is the one who conquers all migrating beings with the Dharma.

original: srid pa gsum na 'dod pa'i 'dam dang nyon mongs las las rab 'das kun dbang po //
analyzed: srid pa gsum na 'dod pa'i 'dam dang nyon mongs las las rab 'das kun dbang po //
translated: The eye of the three existences is the eye of the one who has transcended the mire of desire, afflictions, and karma.

original: byams pa snang dang thugs rje bsam gtan dga' dang btang snyoms rnams la mos //
analyzed: byams pa snang dang thugs rje bsam gtan dga' dang btang snyoms rnams la mos //
translated: The eye of love, appearance, compassion, concentration, joy, and equanimity is the eye of the one who is devoted to those.

original: srid pa gsum po kun du tha dad lus ston chos kyi sgras kyang go 'byed pa //
analyzed: srid pa gsum po kun du tha dad lus ston chos kyi sgras kyang go 'byed pa //
translated: The eye of the one who displays different bodies throughout the three existences and who opens the way with the sound of Dharma is the eye of the one who is like Brahmā.

original: de dang de dag tshangs pa lta bur rnam dag mos shing lta ba'i rnam pa sel //
analyzed: de dang de dag tshangs pa lta bur rnam dag mos shing lta ba'i rnam pa sel //
translated: The eye of the one who is devoted to purity and who removes the aspects of views is the eye of the one who is pure.

original: 'khor las rab tu 'das shing rnam dag yul dang ldan pa bdag po chos kyi dbang //
analyzed: 'khor las rab tu 'das shing rnam dag yul dang ldan pa bdag po chos kyi dbang //
translated: The eye of the one who has transcended the wheel and possesses a pure field is the eye of the one who has power over the Dharma.

original: phyir ldog mi 'gyur blo gros che 'chang gang rnams theg pa dma' dang tha dad la //
analyzed: phyir ldog mi 'gyur blo gros che 'chang gang rnams theg pa dma' dang tha dad la //
translated: Those who are not turned back, who have great wisdom, are different from the Lesser Vehicle.

original: chos kyi dbang por dbang bskur 'jig rten dam pa ye shes phyir ldog mi 'gyur ba //
analyzed: chos kyi dbang por dbang bskur 'jig rten dam pa ye shes phyir ldog mi 'gyur ba //
translated: They are consecrated as lords of the Dharma, the best in the world, because of their irreversible wisdom.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan dbang phyug grags chen de dang de dag 'jig rten dbang //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan dbang phyug grags chen de dang de dag 'jig rten dbang //
translated: They are lords of the qualities of omniscience, famous in the world, lords of the world.

original: nam mkha'i mkha' dbyings lta bur dngos dang @13a *//
analyzed: nam mkha'i mkha' dbyings lta bur dngos dang @13a *//
translated: They are like the realm of space, free from things and

original: rnam bral dmigs pa thams cad rnam bsal ba //
analyzed: rnam bral dmigs pa thams cad rnam bsal ba //
translated: free from all conceptual thoughts.

original: 'gro ba kun tu bya ba nyams len khyu mchog ci la'ang gnas pa med pa ste //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun tu bya ba nyams len khyu mchog ci la'ang gnas pa med pa ste //
translated: They are the best of practitioners in all worlds, but they do not abide in anything.

original: 'gro ba kun tu spyod pa dkar zhugs mkhas pa de dag rab tu mi gnas pa //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun tu spyod pa dkar zhugs mkhas pa de dag rab tu mi gnas pa //
translated: They are wise, engaged in all worlds in pure conduct, but they do not abide in it.

original: de dang de dag ye shes dge zhing dag pas shes rab nam mkha'i dbyings dang 'dra //
analyzed: de dang de dag ye shes dge zhing dag pas shes rab nam mkha'i dbyings dang 'dra //
translated: They are pure and good in their wisdom, like the realm of space.

original: de dang de dag shin tu rgya chen thabs ldan sa lhar 'gro ba kun gyi gsos //
analyzed: de dang de dag shin tu rgya chen thabs ldan sa lhar 'gro ba kun gyi gsos //
translated: They are the lords of the earth, with vast methods, the medicine for all worlds.

original: chu 'dra de dang de dag byams dang snying rje nyon mongs me ni rab tu sel //
analyzed: chu 'dra de dang de dag byams dang snying rje nyon mongs me ni rab tu sel //
translated: Like water, they extinguish the fire of the afflictions of love and compassion.

original: de dang de dag ye shes mes ni nyon mongs sreg cing bag chags bcas pa bsal //
analyzed: de dang de dag ye shes mes ni nyon mongs sreg cing bag chags bcas pa bsal //
translated: Like fire, they burn away the afflictions of beings with the fire of wisdom, together with their latent tendencies.

original: ston pa de dag mi gnas rlung dang 'dra bar srid pa gsum na rab tu rgyu //
analyzed: ston pa de dag mi gnas rlung dang 'dra bar srid pa gsum na rab tu rgyu //
translated: Like the wind, they move through the three existences, without remaining in any place.

original: de dang de dag rin chen 'dra ste shin tu dkon zhing 'gro bar dbul yang sel //
analyzed: de dang de dag rin chen 'dra ste shin tu dkon zhing 'gro bar dbul yang sel //
translated: Like jewels, they are rare in the world and remove the poverty of beings.

original: de dang de dag rdo rje lta bur srid pa gsum na lta ba kun tu 'joms //
analyzed: de dang de dag rdo rje lta bur srid pa gsum na lta ba kun tu 'joms //
translated: Like a vajra, they destroy all views in the three existences.

original: de dang de dag yon tan kun gyi phreng ba sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum mdzes byed //
analyzed: de dang de dag yon tan kun gyi phreng ba sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum mdzes byed //
translated: Like a garland of all good qualities, they beautify the three worlds.

original: ston pa de dag nor bu rin chen mtshungs 'dra spyod pa kun gyi gtsug tu phyin //
analyzed: ston pa de dag nor bu rin chen mtshungs 'dra spyod pa kun gyi gtsug tu phyin //
translated: Like a precious jewel, they are the crest-jewel of all practices.

original: de dang de dag me tog lta bur yon tan rab rgyas byang chub yan lag rtse //
analyzed: de dang de dag me tog lta bur yon tan rab rgyas byang chub yan lag rtse //
translated: Like a flower, they are the peak of the branches of enlightenment, with their fully developed good qualities.

original: phreng ba lta bur de dang de dag smon lam bcings shing 'jig rten mgon la gnas //
analyzed: phreng ba lta bur de dang de dag smon lam bcings shing 'jig rten mgon la gnas //
translated: Like a garland, they are bound by aspirations and remain as lords of the world.

original: de dang de dag tshul khrims ma nyams skyon med rnam dag dri ni dri rab zhim //
analyzed: de dang de dag tshul khrims ma nyams skyon med rnam dag dri ni dri rab zhim //
translated: Their morality is unspoiled, unblemished, pure, and fragrant.

original: de dang de dag 'jig rten gsum na chos dang ye shes kyis ni bag chags dag /
analyzed: de dang de dag 'jig rten gsum na chos dang ye shes kyis ni bag chags dag /
translated: Their Dharma and wisdom in the three worlds are free of habitual tendencies.

original: gdugs 'dra de dang de dag stobs kyi bla @13b res nyon mongs rdul las skyob par byed //
analyzed: gdugs 'dra de dang de dag stobs kyi bla @13b res nyon mongs rdul las skyob par byed //
translated: They are like parasols, protecting from the dust of afflictions with the supreme armor of strength.

original: ye shes rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i thugs mnga' de dang de dag nga rgyal mtshan snyol //
analyzed: ye shes rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i thugs mnga' de dang de dag nga rgyal mtshan snyol //
translated: They have the mind that raises the victory banner of wisdom and lowers the banner of pride.

original: de dang de dag spyod pa'i ba dan sna tshogs yid 'ong ye shes kun tu 'phags //
analyzed: de dang de dag spyod pa'i ba dan sna tshogs yid 'ong ye shes kun tu 'phags //
translated: They are like banners of conduct, with various pleasing aspects, and are exalted in wisdom.

original: gos 'dra de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul yon tan 'gro ba kun la khebs par byed //
analyzed: gos 'dra de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul yon tan 'gro ba kun la khebs par byed //
translated: They are like clothing, covering all beings with the qualities of miracles.

original: theg pa 'dra ba khyu mchog mtha' yas de dang de dag 'jig rten gsum las 'byin //
analyzed: theg pa 'dra ba khyu mchog mtha' yas de dang de dag 'jig rten gsum las 'byin //
translated: They are like vehicles, pulling the three worlds out of the endless mass of beings.

original: de dang de dag rab dul glang po lta bur yid kyis rtag tu dul la gnas //
analyzed: de dang de dag rab dul glang po lta bur yid kyis rtag tu dul la gnas //
translated: They are like well-tamed elephants, always remaining with a tamed mind.

original: de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul rtas ni khal chen khyer zhing 'jig rten gsum las 'da'//
analyzed: de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul rtas ni khal chen khyer zhing 'jig rten gsum las 'da'//
translated: They are like great elephants, carrying the great burden, and they transcend the three worlds.

original: klu yi dbang po lta bu de dang de dag sems kyi yul du chos char 'bebs //
analyzed: klu yi dbang po lta bu de dang de dag sems kyi yul du chos char 'bebs //
translated: They are like lords of the nāgas, raining the rain of Dharma on the objects of their minds.

original: de dang de dag 'gro ba kun la me tog au dum war mtshungs 'dra shin tu dkon //
analyzed: de dang de dag 'gro ba kun la me tog au dum war mtshungs 'dra shin tu dkon //
translated: They are like the udumbara flower, so rare for all beings.

original: dpa' bo lta bu de dang de dag nyon mongs 'joms shing bdud kyi sde rnams 'khrugs //
analyzed: dpa' bo lta bu de dang de dag nyon mongs 'joms shing bdud kyi sde rnams 'khrugs //
translated: They are like heroes, destroying the afflictions and agitating the armies of the māras.

original: mi ldog 'khor lo lta bu de dang de dag 'dren pa rnams kyis rab tu btsud //
analyzed: mi ldog 'khor lo lta bu de dang de dag 'dren pa rnams kyis rab tu btsud //
translated: They are like the irreversible wheel, set in motion by the guides.

original: de dang de dag sgron ma lta bur mun pa sel cing sems can thams cad lam yang ston //
analyzed: de dang de dag sgron ma lta bur mun pa sel cing sems can thams cad lam yang ston //
translated: They are like lamps, dispelling the darkness and showing the path to all beings.

original: de dang de dag chu klung lta bur yon tan ded cing lam rgyun rjes su 'gro /
analyzed: de dang de dag chu klung lta bur yon tan ded cing lam rgyun rjes su 'gro /
translated: They are like rivers, flowing with the current of the path, carrying the stream of good qualities.

original: de dang de dag zam pa lta bur ngal ba med par rtag tu 'gro ba sgrol //
analyzed: de dang de dag zam pa lta bur ngal ba med par rtag tu 'gro ba sgrol //
translated: They are like bridges, always saving beings without tiring.

original: gru dang gru chen lta bur smon lam rab btab ye shes gangs chen mtsho thob byed //
analyzed: gru dang gru chen lta bur smon lam rab btab ye shes gangs chen mtsho thob byed //
translated: They are like boats and great ships, fulfilling the great ocean of wisdom through their great prayers.

original: de dang de dag mnyan pa lta bur 'gro ba ye shes thang chen mchog la 'god //
analyzed: de dang de dag mnyan pa lta bur 'gro ba ye shes thang chen mchog la 'god //
translated: They are like guides who lead beings to the great plain of wisdom.

original: de dag skyed mos tshal gyi dga' brtse zhing 'gro la yang dag spyod pa ston //
analyzed: de dag skyed mos tshal gyi dga' brtse zhing 'gro la yang dag spyod pa ston //
translated: They are like those who enjoy the pleasures of a garden, demonstrating correct conduct.

original: de @14a *// dag chos kyi rnam thar mngon shes me tog ye shes gzhal med khang dag pa //
analyzed: de @14a *// dag chos kyi rnam thar mngon shes me tog ye shes gzhal med khang dag pa //
translated: They are like the flowers of the superknowledges and the palace of the wisdom of liberation.

original: mkhas pa de dang de dag sman ltar nad zhi byed cing nyon mongs rab tu sel //
analyzed: mkhas pa de dang de dag sman ltar nad zhi byed cing nyon mongs rab tu sel //
translated: The wise are like medicine, pacifying the sicknesses and eliminating the afflictions.

original: sman gyis rgyas pa'i gangs ri lta bur de dang de dag ye shes 'byung gnas so //
analyzed: sman gyis rgyas pa'i gangs ri lta bur de dang de dag ye shes 'byung gnas so //
translated: They are like the snow mountains, the source of medicine, the source of wisdom.

original: de dag sangs rgyas lta bur ye shes kyis ni 'gro ba gnyid log mun pa sel //
analyzed: de dag sangs rgyas lta bur ye shes kyis ni 'gro ba gnyid log mun pa sel //
translated: They are like the Buddha, with wisdom dispelling the sleep and darkness of beings.

original: yang dag sangs rgyas lta bur gzhan min yid kyis 'gro ba yang dag rtogs par byed //
analyzed: yang dag sangs rgyas lta bur gzhan min yid kyis 'gro ba yang dag rtogs par byed //
translated: They are like the perfect Buddha, with an unmistaken mind they cause beings to realize.

original: de dang de dag rgyal ba ci 'dra de ltar 'ongs te mkhas pa de nyid gnas //
analyzed: de dang de dag rgyal ba ci 'dra de ltar 'ongs te mkhas pa de nyid gnas //
translated: They are like the Jina, having come in that way, the wise abide in suchness.

original: de dag thams cad mkhyen pa lta bur ye shes 'byung gnas kun nas sgor yang zhugs //
analyzed: de dag thams cad mkhyen pa lta bur ye shes 'byung gnas kun nas sgor yang zhugs //
translated: They have entered the gateway of the source of wisdom, which is like omniscience.

original: zhi ba skyed pa de dang de dag ston pas rab bsngags 'gro ba kun la ston //
analyzed: zhi ba skyed pa de dang de dag ston pas rab bsngags 'gro ba kun la ston //
translated: They are praised by the Teacher for producing peace, and they teach it to all beings.

original: de dang de dag rang gi ye shes yul dang thams cad mkhyen gyi spyod yul shes //
analyzed: de dang de dag rang gi ye shes yul dang thams cad mkhyen gyi spyod yul shes //
translated: They know the domain of their own wisdom and the domain of omniscience.

original: de dang de dag tshad med dpung dang 'dra bar 'gro ba kun na thub pa med //
analyzed: de dang de dag tshad med dpung dang 'dra bar 'gro ba kun na thub pa med //
translated: They are like an immeasurable army, invincible to all beings.

original: de dag ye shes mi 'jigs blo gros 'chang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyang shes //
analyzed: de dag ye shes mi 'jigs blo gros 'chang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyang shes //
translated: They are holders of the wisdom of fearlessness and of intelligence, and they know the Dharma of omniscience.

original: gang na gang dag 'gro ba kun gyi gzugs dang ming rnams ji snyed snang yod pa //
analyzed: gang na gang dag 'gro ba kun gyi gzugs dang ming rnams ji snyed snang yod pa //
translated: Wherever there are forms and names for all beings,

original: kun tu gzugs snyoms gzugs kyi rjes su song zhing ming dbyangs rjes su song ba yin //
analyzed: kun tu gzugs snyoms gzugs kyi rjes su song zhing ming dbyangs rjes su song ba yin //
translated: they are the same with regard to forms, and they follow forms and follow names.

original: gzugs rnams kun las 'das shing ming dang rnam par bral yang bya ba thams cad ston //
analyzed: gzugs rnams kun las 'das shing ming dang rnam par bral yang bya ba thams cad ston //
translated: They transcend all forms and are free from names, yet they display all activities.

original: de dag mthu ni 'gro ba rnams kyis rnam pa kun du brjod par mi nus so //
analyzed: de dag mthu ni 'gro ba rnams kyis rnam pa kun du brjod par mi nus so //
translated: The power of these is such that all the worlds together could not describe it.

original: gang dag 'di 'dra'i yon tan @14b thob cing dngos bral dngos po med pa'i chos gnas shing //
analyzed: gang dag 'di 'dra'i yon tan @14b thob cing dngos bral dngos po med pa'i chos gnas shing //
translated: “Those who have attained such qualities, who abide in the Dharma of non-entity and non-apprehension,

original: yod dang med pa'i mdud pa thams cad bral ba mkhas pa ye shes mngon sum can //
analyzed: yod dang med pa'i mdud pa thams cad bral ba mkhas pa ye shes mngon sum can //
translated: Who are free from all knots of existence and non-existence, who are wise and have direct knowledge,

original: thams cad shes kyang ye shes rten pa ma yin ye shes de la gnas pa min //
analyzed: thams cad shes kyang ye shes rten pa ma yin ye shes de la gnas pa min //
translated: Who know everything but are not supported by knowledge, who do not abide in that knowledge,

original: de dag spyod la 'jug pa yid 'ong 'jig rten dga' bar byed pa bshad par bya //
analyzed: de dag spyod la 'jug pa yid 'ong 'jig rten dga' bar byed pa bshad par bya //
translated: I will explain their delightful conduct, which engages in the world and delights it.

original: chos kyi tshul ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dngos po dben pa lta bur rab rtogs nas //
analyzed: chos kyi tshul ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dngos po dben pa lta bur rab rtogs nas //
translated: “Having fully realized the way of phenomena to be like an illusion, the nature of which is empty,

original: mkhas pas sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs kyis smon lam thabs dang snying rje dag kyang byed //
analyzed: mkhas pas sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs kyis smon lam thabs dang snying rje dag kyang byed //
translated: The wise ones, through the Buddha’s blessing, make aspirations, skillful means, and compassion.

original: sprul pa'i ye shes sgo dang ldan pas khyu mchog bya ba sna tshogs rab ston pa'i //
analyzed: sprul pa'i ye shes sgo dang ldan pas khyu mchog bya ba sna tshogs rab ston pa'i //
translated: Possessing the gateway of the wisdom of emanation, they display various activities of the supreme being.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ma nor yid can rtse gcig mnyam pa med pa legs par grags //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ma nor yid can rtse gcig mnyam pa med pa legs par grags //
translated: The bodhisattvas are those with unerring minds, single-pointed, incomparable, and well known.

original: lus gcig la ni mtha' yas lus dang rgya chen lus rnams tha dad rab tu ston //
analyzed: lus gcig la ni mtha' yas lus dang rgya chen lus rnams tha dad rab tu ston //
translated: They display infinite bodies, vast bodies, and different bodies in a single body.

original: sems med yid med sems kyi yul med 'on kyang 'gro ba kun du de dag ston //
analyzed: sems med yid med sems kyi yul med 'on kyang 'gro ba kun du de dag ston //
translated: They have no mind, no mental activity, and no mental objects, yet they display them to all beings.

original: khyu mchog brjod pa'i pha rol phyin pa de dag dbyangs gcig rnam par rjod byed kyang //
analyzed: khyu mchog brjod pa'i pha rol phyin pa de dag dbyangs gcig rnam par rjod byed kyang //
translated: Those who have gone beyond the expression of the supreme vehicle express themselves with a single voice,

original: 'gro ba dag gis sgra skad ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu rjod //
analyzed: 'gro ba dag gis sgra skad ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu rjod //
translated: yet they express all the sounds and voices that exist in the world.

original: nyon mongs rgyud byung lus dang bral yang sems can rnams kyi lus la dbang bsgyur te //
analyzed: nyon mongs rgyud byung lus dang bral yang sems can rnams kyi lus la dbang bsgyur te //
translated: Although they are free from the body that arises from the continuum of afflictions, they control the bodies of beings.

original: brjod du med pa'i tshul gyis zhi ba rtogs shing sgra rnams thams cad rab tu ston //
analyzed: brjod du med pa'i tshul gyis zhi ba rtogs shing sgra rnams thams cad rab tu ston //
