translated: They realize peace through the inexpressible way and display all sounds.

original: de dag sems kyi rang bzhin zhi zhing 'od gsal nam mkha' mtshungs par yang dag shes //
analyzed: de dag sems kyi rang bzhin zhi zhing 'od gsal nam mkha' mtshungs par yang dag shes //
translated: They know the nature of the mind to be peaceful, luminous, and equal to space.

original: 'gro ba kun la bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs sgo nas 'jig @15a *//
analyzed: 'gro ba kun la bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs sgo nas 'jig @15a *//
translated: They manifest various kinds of activities for all beings.

original: rten sna tshogs ston //
analyzed: rten sna tshogs ston //
translated: They manifest various kinds of worlds.

original: de dag lus rnams gang la'ang gnas pa med de lus kyang de dag ston pa byed //
analyzed: de dag lus rnams gang la'ang gnas pa med de lus kyang de dag ston pa byed //
translated: They do not dwell on any body, yet they manifest bodies.

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyi ni skye ba dag dang rgyu mthun gnas pa ji snyed pa //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyi ni skye ba dag dang rgyu mthun gnas pa ji snyed pa //
translated: They manifest bodies in all the births of all beings,

original: thams cad kun du skye ba'i lus dang ldan yang skye ba dag la gnas pa med //
analyzed: thams cad kun du skye ba'i lus dang ldan yang skye ba dag la gnas pa med //
translated: but they do not dwell on any birth.

original: rang gi lus la mkha' 'dra dngos bral sems can sems la sna tshogs rnam pa ste //
analyzed: rang gi lus la mkha' 'dra dngos bral sems can sems la sna tshogs rnam pa ste //
translated: They have bodies that are like space, free of substantiality, and they manifest various kinds of minds to beings.

original: mkhas pa kun la dbang bsgyur de dag lus ni mtha' yas kun tu ston byed cing //
analyzed: mkhas pa kun la dbang bsgyur de dag lus ni mtha' yas kun tu ston byed cing //
translated: They have mastery over all the skills and they manifest infinite bodies.🔽They make offerings to the Omniscient One with flowers, incense, perfume,

original: me tog dri dang byug pa phye ma sil snyan gdugs dang ba dan rgyal mtshan rnams //
analyzed: me tog dri dang byug pa phye ma sil snyan gdugs dang ba dan rgyal mtshan rnams //
translated: powders, music, parasols, banners, and flags,

original: thams cad mkhyen la mchod pas rkang gnyis gtso bo 'jig rten mchog la mchod byed cing //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen la mchod pas rkang gnyis gtso bo 'jig rten mchog la mchod byed cing //
translated: and they make offerings to the supreme human, the best in the world.

original: mkhas pa bsam pa thag pas lus kyi 'du byed mchod pa dam pa kun du ston //
analyzed: mkhas pa bsam pa thag pas lus kyi 'du byed mchod pa dam pa kun du ston //
translated: The wise ones, with firm intention, show the highest worship with the activity of their bodies.

original: mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba zhabs kyi drung 'khod rgyal ba thams cad kyi //
analyzed: mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba zhabs kyi drung 'khod rgyal ba thams cad kyi //
translated: Those wise ones, in the presence of the Victorious Ones,

original: 'khor rnams kun na snang zhing mtshungs med de dag zhu ba kun kyang zhu ba byed //
analyzed: 'khor rnams kun na snang zhing mtshungs med de dag zhu ba kun kyang zhu ba byed //
translated: are seen in the retinues of all the Victorious Ones, and they ask their questions, which are unequaled.

original: chos kyi dam pa thos nas ting 'dzin re re mtha' yas sgo ldan thob gyur cing //
analyzed: chos kyi dam pa thos nas ting 'dzin re re mtha' yas sgo ldan thob gyur cing //
translated: Having heard the highest Dharma, they attain each samādhi with its infinite gateways,

original: blo gros ldan pa de snyed rnam par ldang ba ston pa byed kyang zad pa med //
analyzed: blo gros ldan pa de snyed rnam par ldang ba ston pa byed kyang zad pa med //
translated: and those wise ones display their arising without end.

original: 'gro ba sgyu ma lta bur rtogs nas shes rab ye shes thabs kyi pha rol phyin //
analyzed: 'gro ba sgyu ma lta bur rtogs nas shes rab ye shes thabs kyi pha rol phyin //
translated: Having realized beings to be like illusions, they perfect the wisdom, the knowledge, and the methods.

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i chos dang gzugs spos mtha' yas dang ba 'gro ba kun la ston //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i chos dang gzugs spos mtha' yas dang ba 'gro ba kun la ston //
translated: They display to all beings the illusory phenomena and forms, the infinite gateways, and the purity.

original: sna tshogs gzugs dang sgra rnams mtha' yas shin tu rgya che sems kyang rab tu ston //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs dang sgra rnams mtha' yas shin tu rgya che sems kyang rab tu ston //
translated: They also display the various forms and sounds, which are infinite and extremely vast.

original: 'gro ba thams cad la ni @15b 'du shes dra ba 'jug pa ston kyang gnas pa med //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad la ni @15b 'du shes dra ba 'jug pa ston kyang gnas pa med //
translated: They show the net of perceptions to all beings, but they do not dwell on them.

original: 'gro don rjes 'gro de dag la la dag tu thog ma'i sems su 'gro ba ston //
analyzed: 'gro don rjes 'gro de dag la la dag tu thog ma'i sems su 'gro ba ston //
translated: For the sake of beings, they show the first aspiration to some,

original: la lar 'gro ba kun la byang chub spyod pa mtha' yas rgya chen dag kyang ston //
analyzed: la lar 'gro ba kun la byang chub spyod pa mtha' yas rgya chen dag kyang ston //
translated: and to some they show the infinite, vast bodhisattva conduct for all beings.

original: la lar sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab rnams //
analyzed: la lar sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab rnams //
translated: To some they show generosity, discipline, patience, diligence, meditation, and wisdom,

original: la lar tshangs pa'i lam sdud kha cig tu ni spyod pa mchog kyang rab tu ston //
analyzed: la lar tshangs pa'i lam sdud kha cig tu ni spyod pa mchog kyang rab tu ston //
translated: and to some they show the supreme conduct of gathering on the path of Brahmā.

original: mkhas pa rtogs med de dag la lar spyod pa rdzogs shing bzod pa thob pa ston //
analyzed: mkhas pa rtogs med de dag la lar spyod pa rdzogs shing bzod pa thob pa ston //
translated: To some, the wise ones show the perfection of conduct and the attainment of acceptance, without conceptualization.🔽To some they show the attainment of the acceptance of the nonarising of phenomena, and to some they show the stage of irreversibility.

original: la lar skye ba gcig gis thogs par nges shing la lar rgyal bas dbang bskur ba //
analyzed: la lar skye ba gcig gis thogs par nges shing la lar rgyal bas dbang bskur ba //
translated: To some they show the stage of definite progress in one lifetime, and to some they show the empowerment of the Victorious Ones.

original: la lar nyan thos gzugs su gyur cing la la dag tu rang rgyal gzugs su gyur //
analyzed: la lar nyan thos gzugs su gyur cing la la dag tu rang rgyal gzugs su gyur //
translated: To some they show the form of a śrāvaka, and to some they show the form of a pratyekabuddha.

original: bye ba khrag khrig mang po'i zhing du mya ngan 'da' bas spyod las ldog pa med //
analyzed: bye ba khrag khrig mang po'i zhing du mya ngan 'da' bas spyod las ldog pa med //
translated: They manifest nirvana in many quintillions of realms, but their conduct is not reversed.

original: de dag la lar lha dbang brgya byin lha dang bcas pa la lar tshangs par 'gyur //
analyzed: de dag la lar lha dbang brgya byin lha dang bcas pa la lar tshangs par 'gyur //
translated: In some places they are Śakra, lord of the gods, together with the gods; in some places they are Brahmā;

original: de dag la lar lha yi bu mo brgyas bskor la lar gcig pu spyod pa ston //
analyzed: de dag la lar lha yi bu mo brgyas bskor la lar gcig pu spyod pa ston //
translated: in some places they are surrounded by a hundred celestial maidens; in some places they manifest solitary conduct.

original: la lar dge slong rab tu zhi zhing yid zhi la lar rgyal po dbang phyug 'gyur //
analyzed: la lar dge slong rab tu zhi zhing yid zhi la lar rgyal po dbang phyug 'gyur //
translated: In some places they are monks, peaceful and tranquil; in some places they are kings with power;

original: la lar chos kyi dra bar 'jug pa'i ye shes khyu mchog gzugs kyang rab tu ston //
analyzed: la lar chos kyi dra bar 'jug pa'i ye shes khyu mchog gzugs kyang rab tu ston //
translated: in some places they manifest the form of a bull of knowledge entering the net of the Dharma.

original: la lar bud med sgyu rtsal pha rol rab phyin la lar dka' thub can du 'gyur //
analyzed: la lar bud med sgyu rtsal pha rol rab phyin la lar dka' thub can du 'gyur //
translated: In some places they are women who have perfected the arts; in some places they are ascetics;

original: la lar 'dod pa'i longs spyod rgya chen ston cing la lar bsam gtan thub pa byed //
analyzed: la lar 'dod pa'i longs spyod rgya chen ston cing la lar bsam gtan thub pa byed //
translated: in some places they manifest vast enjoyment of desire; in some places they are sages in meditation.

original: la lar mya ngan 'da' dang tshe yis dang la lar rgan dang byis par ston //
analyzed: la lar mya ngan 'da' dang tshe yis dang la lar rgan dang byis par ston //
translated: In some places they manifest nirvana and life; in some places they manifest as old and young.

original: de dag spyod pa bsams na skye bo myos par 'gyur @16a *//
analyzed: de dag spyod pa bsams na skye bo myos par 'gyur @16a *//
translated: When one thinks of their conduct, people become confused.

original: te yid gnyis rnyed par 'gyur //
analyzed: te yid gnyis rnyed par 'gyur //
translated: And they will have doubts about the Buddha’s teaching.

original: la lar lha dang 'grogs shing la lar shi 'pho la lar mngal 'gro gnas pa ston //
analyzed: la lar lha dang 'grogs shing la lar shi 'pho la lar mngal 'gro gnas pa ston //
translated: Some will be born in the heavens, some will die and transmigrate, some will enter the womb, and some will be born.

original: la lar mngal zhugs la lar rnam par sangs rgyas la lar 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
analyzed: la lar mngal zhugs la lar rnam par sangs rgyas la lar 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
translated: Some will be fully enlightened, some will turn the wheel, and some will enter the womb.

original: la lar skye ba la lar mya ngan 'das pa la lar bzo yang rab tu slob //
analyzed: la lar skye ba la lar mya ngan 'das pa la lar bzo yang rab tu slob //
translated: Some will be born, some will attain nirvana, and some will train in the arts.

original: la lar bud med tshogs kyi dbus gnas la lar ting 'dzin la lar mngon par 'byung //
analyzed: la lar bud med tshogs kyi dbus gnas la lar ting 'dzin la lar mngon par 'byung //
translated: Some will be surrounded by a retinue of women, some will be in samadhi, and some will manifest leaving home.

original: la lar khyu mchog byang chub dam par sangs rgyas byang chub shing gi drung na bzhugs //
analyzed: la lar khyu mchog byang chub dam par sangs rgyas byang chub shing gi drung na bzhugs //
translated: Some will be the supreme bull, fully enlightened, sitting at the foot of the Bodhi tree,

original: la lar 'khor lo rab tu bskor zhing la lar sna tshogs chos rnams yongs su tshol //
analyzed: la lar 'khor lo rab tu bskor zhing la lar sna tshogs chos rnams yongs su tshol //
translated: Some will turn the wheel, and some will seek out various teachings.

original: la lar sangs rgyas gyur cing zhing rnams bye ba brgyar khyab 'gro bar ston byed kyang //
analyzed: la lar sangs rgyas gyur cing zhing rnams bye ba brgyar khyab 'gro bar ston byed kyang //
translated: Some will become buddhas and manifest going to a hundred million realms,

original: byang chub don du spyod pa dag gis tshogs rnams las kyang phyir ldog ma yin no //
analyzed: byang chub don du spyod pa dag gis tshogs rnams las kyang phyir ldog ma yin no //
translated: But they will not turn back from the accumulations of conduct for the sake of enlightenment.

original: bskal pa'i grangs la 'jug pa'i pha rol phyin pas bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya dag /
analyzed: bskal pa'i grangs la 'jug pa'i pha rol phyin pas bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya dag /
translated: for a hundred million eons,

original: khyu mchog sems gcig nang ston sems gcig bskal pa brgyar yang de bzhin ston pa byed //
analyzed: khyu mchog sems gcig nang ston sems gcig bskal pa brgyar yang de bzhin ston pa byed //
translated: they can display a single thought, and likewise, for a hundred eons.

original: 'gro ba thams cad la yang rtog dang mi rtog rtog pa'i yul rnams thams cad ston //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad la yang rtog dang mi rtog rtog pa'i yul rnams thams cad ston //
translated: They can display all the thoughts and non-thoughts of all beings, and all the objects of thought.

original: gsog pa med cing phyogs la gnas med spyod pa de dag kun kyang rab tu ston //
analyzed: gsog pa med cing phyogs la gnas med spyod pa de dag kun kyang rab tu ston //
translated: They can display all those activities without accumulating anything or abiding in any direction.

original: gang phyir rgyal ba nye rgyal de dag nyi tshe'i phyogs med kun na bzhugs pas na //
analyzed: gang phyir rgyal ba nye rgyal de dag nyi tshe'i phyogs med kun na bzhugs pas na //
translated: Because those Victorious Ones, the Jinas, are not limited to any one direction,

original: 'gro ba kun gyi rgyal ba ji snyed pa dag thams cad rdul gcig steng du mthong //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun gyi rgyal ba ji snyed pa dag thams cad rdul gcig steng du mthong //
translated: they see all the Victorious Ones of all worlds on a single atom.

original: @16b sangs rgyas zhing rnams bsgrubs dang sems can yul dang chos kyi rgyu tshul rnams kyang mthong //
analyzed: @16b sangs rgyas zhing rnams bsgrubs dang sems can yul dang chos kyi rgyu tshul rnams kyang mthong //
translated: They see the accomplishment of buddha realms, the realms of sentient beings, and the way of the Dharma.

original: de ltar brtson pas bskal pa khrag khrig brtson byed 'on kyang cha shas zad mi 'gyur //
analyzed: de ltar brtson pas bskal pa khrag khrig brtson byed 'on kyang cha shas zad mi 'gyur //
translated: Even if they were to strive for a hundred trillion eons, such striving would not diminish.

original: de ltar 'gro ba kun gyi sems can tshul rnams mtha' yas rgya chen rab tu shes //
analyzed: de ltar 'gro ba kun gyi sems can tshul rnams mtha' yas rgya chen rab tu shes //
translated: In this way, they know the infinite, vast ways of all beings.

original: sems can gcig la mtha' yas lus dang rgyu dang bye ba khrag khrig yod pa rnams //
analyzed: sems can gcig la mtha' yas lus dang rgyu dang bye ba khrag khrig yod pa rnams //
translated: They display to each being infinite bodies, causes, and manifestations in the trillions.

original: de dag 'gro ba gcig dang ma lus thams cad dag la rnam pa kun du ston pa byed //
analyzed: de dag 'gro ba gcig dang ma lus thams cad dag la rnam pa kun du ston pa byed //
translated: They display them to all beings, without exception, in every way.

original: bslab pa 'di yi phyogs la pha rol phyin te ma bslabs rnams ni ston pa byed //
analyzed: bslab pa 'di yi phyogs la pha rol phyin te ma bslabs rnams ni ston pa byed //
translated: They have perfected this training and teach those who have not trained.

original: dbang po rnon po dang ni 'bring dang gang dag dbang po rtul ba'ang rab shes nas //
analyzed: dbang po rnon po dang ni 'bring dang gang dag dbang po rtul ba'ang rab shes nas //
translated: They know those with sharp faculties, those with middling faculties, and those with dull faculties.

original: 'gro bar skal ba yod dang skal ba med pa'i dbang po'i 'khor lo skor ba byed //
analyzed: 'gro bar skal ba yod dang skal ba med pa'i dbang po'i 'khor lo skor ba byed //
translated: They turn the wheel of the faculties of those with potential and those without potential.

original: dbang po re re la yang dbang po thams cad rnam pa phan tshun gnas pa dang // dbang po'i dngos po phra ba'i tshul dang gang dag dbang po brtan pa'ang rab tu shes //
analyzed: dbang po re re la yang dbang po thams cad rnam pa phan tshun gnas pa dang // dbang po'i dngos po phra ba'i tshul dang gang dag dbang po brtan pa'ang rab tu shes //
translated: They know that each faculty contains all faculties, that the nature of the faculties is subtle, and that the faculties are stable.

original: de ltar khams dang mos dang bsam pa spyod dang nyon mongs bag chags rnams kyang shes; ;sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yi sems spyod da ltar byung ba'ang de bzhin te //
analyzed: de ltar khams dang mos dang bsam pa spyod dang nyon mongs bag chags rnams kyang shes; ;sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yi sems spyod da ltar byung ba'ang de bzhin te //
translated: “They know the elements, inclinations, thoughts, conduct, and kleśas, And the traces of the past and the future, and the present conduct of mind.

original: sems can kun gyi spyod pa'i pha rol phyin kyang 'ong dang 'gro ba yod ma yin //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi spyod pa'i pha rol phyin kyang 'ong dang 'gro ba yod ma yin //
translated: They have gone beyond the conduct of all beings, but they do not come or go.

original: ma nor spyod pa shes nas 'gro ba kun la chos kyi dam pa ston pa byed //
analyzed: ma nor spyod pa shes nas 'gro ba kun la chos kyi dam pa ston pa byed //
translated: Knowing the unmistaken conduct, they teach the supreme Dharma to all beings.

original: de ltar sems kyi sems spyod sna tshogs kun nas nyon mongs med pa dag /
analyzed: de ltar sems kyi sems spyod sna tshogs kun nas nyon mongs med pa dag /
translated: “Thus the various conducts of the mind are all without defilement.

original: sems gcig la ni khong du chud nas byang chub @17a *//
analyzed: sems gcig la ni khong du chud nas byang chub @17a *//
translated: When they have understood them in a single mind,

original: mchog tu kun mkhyen rnam sangs rgya //
analyzed: mchog tu kun mkhyen rnam sangs rgya //
translated: they attain omniscience and supreme enlightenment.

original: sems kyi skad cig gcig gis 'gro ba rnams phye rang gi shes pas rtogs gyur nas //
analyzed: sems kyi skad cig gcig gis 'gro ba rnams phye rang gi shes pas rtogs gyur nas //
translated: “In a single instant of mind they understand the distinctions of beings, and with their knowledge

original: sems kyi tshul shes sems med rab tu gzhol bas ye shes mchog la kun kyang 'god //
analyzed: sems kyi tshul shes sems med rab tu gzhol bas ye shes mchog la kun kyang 'god //
translated: they cause all beings to attain the supreme wisdom by understanding the mind and being free of the mind.”

original: rdzu 'phrul mchog thob ye shes khyu mchog mngon par shes pa kun gyis rab tu 'phags //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul mchog thob ye shes khyu mchog mngon par shes pa kun gyis rab tu 'phags //
translated: Having attained the highest of miracles, they are the best of the wise, exalted by all their higher perceptions.

original: sems bskyed gcig gis khrag khrig mtha' yas zhing dang phyogs rnams thams cad du'ang 'gro /
analyzed: sems bskyed gcig gis khrag khrig mtha' yas zhing dang phyogs rnams thams cad du'ang 'gro /
translated: In a single instant of thought, they go to countless millions of realms in all directions.

original: de ltar ye shes dbang bsgyur 'gro zhing bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig zad byed kyang //
analyzed: de ltar ye shes dbang bsgyur 'gro zhing bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig zad byed kyang //
translated: In this way, they go, their wisdom in control, and they spend millions of eons.

original: skra rgyud shin tu phra ba gcig la zhugs par gnas las gar yang 'pho ba med //
analyzed: skra rgyud shin tu phra ba gcig la zhugs par gnas las gar yang 'pho ba med //
translated: But they do not move from the tip of a single hair.

original: 'tsho ba'i don du sgyu mkhan gzugs rnams sna tshogs 'gro ba kun la ston byed kyang //
analyzed: 'tsho ba'i don du sgyu mkhan gzugs rnams sna tshogs 'gro ba kun la ston byed kyang //
translated: For the sake of livelihood, magicians show all kinds of forms to all kinds of people.

original: sgyu ma kun btsal gzugs su mi dmigs gzugs yod ma yin par yang dmigs pa med //
analyzed: sgyu ma kun btsal gzugs su mi dmigs gzugs yod ma yin par yang dmigs pa med //
translated: But when they search for the illusion, they do not find any form, and yet they see it.

original: de ltar mkhas pa ye shes thabs dang shes rab rgya chen sgyu mar zhugs pa rnams //
analyzed: de ltar mkhas pa ye shes thabs dang shes rab rgya chen sgyu mar zhugs pa rnams //
translated: In the same way, the wise ones, with their vast wisdom, skill in means, and illusion,

original: sprul pa phun sum tshogs pas 'jig rten phal chen khyab par byas shing rab tu ston //
analyzed: sprul pa phun sum tshogs pas 'jig rten phal chen khyab par byas shing rab tu ston //
translated: pervade the world with their perfect emanations and display them.

original: nyi ma zla ba mkha' la rgyu zhing mdzes la shin tu 'phags pa'i rnams //
analyzed: nyi ma zla ba mkha' la rgyu zhing mdzes la shin tu 'phags pa'i rnams //
translated: The sun and moon are beautiful as they move through the sky, and they are very exalted.

original: ma rnyogs chu rnams ji snyed dag tu snang yang de ni chu dang 'dres ma yin //
analyzed: ma rnyogs chu rnams ji snyed dag tu snang yang de ni chu dang 'dres ma yin //
translated: The unpolluted waters appear in all the various ways, but they are not mixed with the water.

original: de ltar chos nyid dag pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog la shes pas shin tu 'phags pa'i rnams //
analyzed: de ltar chos nyid dag pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog la shes pas shin tu 'phags pa'i rnams //
translated: In the same way, the ones who are exalted through knowledge of the supreme maṇḍala of the pure nature

original: 'gro ba dag pa'i sems kyi @17b yul la snang yang 'gro ba dag dang 'dres ma yin //
analyzed: 'gro ba dag pa'i sems kyi @17b yul la snang yang 'gro ba dag dang 'dres ma yin //
translated: appear in the field of the pure mind of beings, but they are not mixed with beings.

original: la la gnyid log rmi lam dag na bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad byed //
analyzed: la la gnyid log rmi lam dag na bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad byed //
translated: Some, while asleep in dreams, do various different kinds of work.🔽They dream of many trillions of years passing, but the night is not over.

original: lo ni bye ba khrag khrig mang po zad par rmis kyang mtshan mo de ma zad; ;de ltar chos nyid rang bzhin mtshungs par rjes rtogs bya ba sna tshogs kun ston te //
analyzed: lo ni bye ba khrag khrig mang po zad par rmis kyang mtshan mo de ma zad; ;de ltar chos nyid rang bzhin mtshungs par rjes rtogs bya ba sna tshogs kun ston te //
translated: In the same way, those who have realized the nature that is the same as the essence show all kinds of activities.

original: skad cig gcig la bskal pa bye ba zad byed de dag ye shes zad mi 'gyur //
analyzed: skad cig gcig la bskal pa bye ba zad byed de dag ye shes zad mi 'gyur //
translated: In a single instant they pass through a trillion eons, but their wisdom is not exhausted.

original: ri yi dbang po'i ri sul gnas pa 'jig rten dag dang mnyam du thos pa'i sgra //
analyzed: ri yi dbang po'i ri sul gnas pa 'jig rten dag dang mnyam du thos pa'i sgra //
translated: The sounds that are heard in the world are the sounds of the mountains, the lords of the earth.

original: kun nas sgra yi sgra brnyan de dang 'dra bar brjod kyang rtog cing g-yo ba med //
analyzed: kun nas sgra yi sgra brnyan de dang 'dra bar brjod kyang rtog cing g-yo ba med //
translated: Like an echo, the sound is produced by the voice, but it is not conceptual and does not move.

original: de bzhin chos kyi rang bzhin shes pa'i khyu mchog byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa dag /
analyzed: de bzhin chos kyi rang bzhin shes pa'i khyu mchog byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa dag /
translated: In the same way, the wise bodhisattvas, the best of beings, who know the nature of phenomena,

original: rtog pa med par sems can sgra rnams ji snyed par ni chos dang spyod pa ston //
analyzed: rtog pa med par sems can sgra rnams ji snyed par ni chos dang spyod pa ston //
translated: Teach the Dharma and the way to practice to beings without conceptualizing.

original: dpyid zla dag gi smig rgyu g-yos la ji ltar sems can chur ni 'du shes nas //
analyzed: dpyid zla dag gi smig rgyu g-yos la ji ltar sems can chur ni 'du shes nas //
translated: When the mirage of spring moves, beings think it is water,

original: de nas chu rnyed mi 'gyur btung du med cing je bas je skom rnams 'phel ba //
analyzed: de nas chu rnyed mi 'gyur btung du med cing je bas je skom rnams 'phel ba //
translated: But when they get there, there is no water to drink, and their thirst increases.

original: de ltar mkhas pa thar la zhugs pa sems can dag gi nyon mongs g-yo ba'i rnams //
analyzed: de ltar mkhas pa thar la zhugs pa sems can dag gi nyon mongs g-yo ba'i rnams //
translated: In the same way, the wise who have entered the path to liberation,

original: shes pas rtog nas sems can 'du shes bya med phyir zhing bya ba rnam par 'phel //
analyzed: shes pas rtog nas sems can 'du shes bya med phyir zhing bya ba rnam par 'phel //
translated: Knowing the movements of beings’ afflictions, think of them as beings, but their activity increases.

original: gzugs ni dbu ba lta bur khyu mchog ston te tshor ba chu yi chu bur 'dra //
analyzed: gzugs ni dbu ba lta bur khyu mchog ston te tshor ba chu yi chu bur 'dra //
translated: The Victorious One has said that forms are like foam, feelings are like water bubbles,

original: 'du shes thams cad smig rgyu lta bur rag las 'dus byas chu skyes shing dang 'dra //
analyzed: 'du shes thams cad smig rgyu lta bur rag las 'dus byas chu skyes shing dang 'dra //
translated: All perceptions are like mirages, dependent on conditions, and compounded things are like water-born plants.

original: sems ni sgyu 'dra bsgrub bya skyed byed de bzhin bya ba sna tshogs rab tu ston //
analyzed: sems ni sgyu 'dra bsgrub bya skyed byed de bzhin bya ba sna tshogs rab tu ston //
translated: The mind is like an illusion, producing what is to be accomplished, and thus displays various activities.

original: de ltar phung po dgod pa ston kyang dbang @18a *//
analyzed: de ltar phung po dgod pa ston kyang dbang @18a *//
translated: Thus, although the arrangement of the aggregates is taught,

original: bsgyur dag ni de la gnas pa med //
analyzed: bsgyur dag ni de la gnas pa med //
translated: the one who controls them does not abide in them.

original: skye mched stong pa'i rang bzhin dbang med 'khrul 'khor bya ba kun du 'byin byed dang // khams ni chos kyi dbyings mtshungs dngos po dag dang bral bar 'gro ba rnams la ston //
analyzed: skye mched stong pa'i rang bzhin dbang med 'khrul 'khor bya ba kun du 'byin byed dang // khams ni chos kyi dbyings mtshungs dngos po dag dang bral bar 'gro ba rnams la ston //
translated: The nature of the empty sense bases is powerless, producing the machinery of delusion, and the elements, equal to the dharmadhatu, are taught to beings as free from entities.

original: dam pa'i don tshul zhi ba las ni bden pa sna tshogs rnams kyang rab tu ston //
analyzed: dam pa'i don tshul zhi ba las ni bden pa sna tshogs rnams kyang rab tu ston //
translated: From the peace of the way of the ultimate truth, the various truths are also taught.

original: de ltar de dag chos tshul rnam par dgod pa ston pa byed kyang gnas pa med //
analyzed: de ltar de dag chos tshul rnam par dgod pa ston pa byed kyang gnas pa med //
translated: Thus, although they teach the arrangement of the way of the Dharma, they do not abide.

original: 'ong ba med cing phyogs su 'gro ba med la rgyud du gnas pa med pa yi //
analyzed: 'ong ba med cing phyogs su 'gro ba med la rgyud du gnas pa med pa yi //
translated: There is no coming, no going to a direction, and no abiding in a continuum.

original: nyon mongs rgyu las byung ba'i las dang las las sdug bsngal de ltar lam gsum du //
analyzed: nyon mongs rgyu las byung ba'i las dang las las sdug bsngal de ltar lam gsum du //
translated: “The three paths of karma arising from the cause of the afflictions, and suffering arising from karma,

original: rkyen la rag las 'byung ba rnams dang yod dang med las rab tu 'das pa yi //
analyzed: rkyen la rag las 'byung ba rnams dang yod dang med las rab tu 'das pa yi //
translated: The arising of things dependent on conditions, and the transcendence of existence and nonexistence,

original: yang dag don dam dbu ma'i lam ni dngos po med la gnas pa rab tu ston //
analyzed: yang dag don dam dbu ma'i lam ni dngos po med la gnas pa rab tu ston //
translated: “The path of the middle way of the ultimate truth, the absence of entities, is taught.

original: skad cig gcig la dus gsum khong du chud kyang skad cig sna tshogs rnams kyang ston //
analyzed: skad cig gcig la dus gsum khong du chud kyang skad cig sna tshogs rnams kyang ston //
translated: In a single instant, the three times are understood, and various instants are taught.🔽“The various activities and objects of the desire and formless realms are taught.

original: 'dod dang gzugs med khams kyi yul dang bya ba sna tshogs ston par byed; ;sdom pa gsum gyi spyod dang rab tu ldan zhing thar pa gsum yang rab tu ston //
analyzed: 'dod dang gzugs med khams kyi yul dang bya ba sna tshogs ston par byed; ;sdom pa gsum gyi spyod dang rab tu ldan zhing thar pa gsum yang rab tu ston //
translated: The conduct of the three vows is possessed, and the three liberations are taught.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gcig la theg pa gsum du rnam par dgod pa de bzhin ston; ;gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rab tu dbye ba'i chos dang dbang po pha rol phyin //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gcig la theg pa gsum du rnam par dgod pa de bzhin ston; ;gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rab tu dbye ba'i chos dang dbang po pha rol phyin //
translated: “The single omniscience is taught as the arrangement of the three vehicles, and the perfection of the faculties of the Dharma that distinguishes the possible from the impossible,

original: khams dang mos pa dag dang nyon mongs rnam 'byed kun du 'gro ba thob gyur pa //
analyzed: khams dang mos pa dag dang nyon mongs rnam 'byed kun du 'gro ba thob gyur pa //
translated: The Buddha, with his knowledge of the various elements, inclinations, and afflictions, and of the universal and specific,

original: mig @18b gi yul gyur sngon gyi gnas pa dran zhing nyon mongs zhi bar mkhas pa dag /
analyzed: mig @18b gi yul gyur sngon gyi gnas pa dran zhing nyon mongs zhi bar mkhas pa dag /
translated: Remembers his former abodes and the afflictions of beings, and is skilled in their pacification.

original: sangs rgyas stobs bcu dag gis ye shes shin tu yangs kyang stobs la dmigs pa med //
analyzed: sangs rgyas stobs bcu dag gis ye shes shin tu yangs kyang stobs la dmigs pa med //
translated: The Buddha, with his ten powers, has vast knowledge, but he has no reference to power.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su dpog stong 'gro ba kun du mngon sum chos bzhed de //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su dpog stong 'gro ba kun du mngon sum chos bzhed de //
translated: The Buddha, with his knowledge of the deaths and rebirths of beings, knows the past and future of all beings.

original: nyon mongs zag pa lhan cig skyes pa mi mnga' byang ba'ang brnyes par gyur pa med //
analyzed: nyon mongs zag pa lhan cig skyes pa mi mnga' byang ba'ang brnyes par gyur pa med //
translated: The Buddha, with his knowledge of the exhaustion of defilements, has no defilements or traces, and has attained purification.

original: 'byung ba thugs su chud pa'i ye shes rgya chen des ni 'gro ba 'don pa mdzad //
analyzed: 'byung ba thugs su chud pa'i ye shes rgya chen des ni 'gro ba 'don pa mdzad //
translated: With this vast knowledge of the elements, he delivers beings.

original: 'di yi gnas la rgyal sras 'jigs pa med cing 'on kyang zhi bar spyod pa med //
analyzed: 'di yi gnas la rgyal sras 'jigs pa med cing 'on kyang zhi bar spyod pa med //
translated: The Buddha, with his knowledge of the various elements, has no fear in the face of beings, but does not engage in peaceful conduct.

original: 'khrul pa mi mnga' lam las g-yo ba'ang mi mnga' dgongs pa nyams pa'ang mi mnga' ste //
analyzed: 'khrul pa mi mnga' lam las g-yo ba'ang mi mnga' dgongs pa nyams pa'ang mi mnga' ste //
translated: The Buddha, with his knowledge of the various elements, has no error, no wavering from the path, and no loss of intention.

original: mos dang brtson 'grus ting 'dzin shes rab rnam par 'byed pa ye shes gang du'ang nyams pa med pa //
analyzed: mos dang brtson 'grus ting 'dzin shes rab rnam par 'byed pa ye shes gang du'ang nyams pa med pa //
translated: Their diligence, absorption, and insight are never impaired.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa mdzad sdom pa gsum mdzad dus gsum kun la mngon sum mkhyen mnga' ba //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa mdzad sdom pa gsum mdzad dus gsum kun la mngon sum mkhyen mnga' ba //
translated: They have attained omniscience and the three vows, and know all three times directly.

original: 'gro ba kun gyis ma thob byams pa'i chos nyid mi 'phrogs chags pa med brnyes pa //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun gyis ma thob byams pa'i chos nyid mi 'phrogs chags pa med brnyes pa //
translated: They have attained the unattached Dharma of love, which is not obtained by all beings.

original: chos sgo gang dag gis ni spyod pa 'di dag rab tu thob pa smra ba'i mchog /
analyzed: chos sgo gang dag gis ni spyod pa 'di dag rab tu thob pa smra ba'i mchog /
translated: The supreme teachers have attained these practices through the doors of Dharma.

original: de dag yon tan mang po don gyis brgyan pa'i phyogs tsam bdag gis brjod par bya //
analyzed: de dag yon tan mang po don gyis brgyan pa'i phyogs tsam bdag gis brjod par bya //
translated: I will now describe just a few of their many qualities, which are adorned with meaning.

original: de dag spyod pa bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu brjod kyang zad par mi nus te //
analyzed: de dag spyod pa bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu brjod kyang zad par mi nus te //
translated: Even if one were to speak for a trillion eons, one could not exhaust the topic of their conduct.

original: 'on kyang ji ltar sa la sa rdul 'dra ye shes spyod pa phyogs tsam brjod par bya //
analyzed: 'on kyang ji ltar sa la sa rdul 'dra ye shes spyod pa phyogs tsam brjod par bya //
translated: Nevertheless, I will describe just a fraction of the conduct of wisdom, just as a speck of dust is a fraction of the earth.

original: sangs rgyas ye shes rten ldan bsam pa thob pas ngo mtshar 'du shes gnas pa @19a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas ye shes rten ldan bsam pa thob pas ngo mtshar 'du shes gnas pa @19a *//
translated: Those who have attained the wisdom of the buddhas have a sense of wonder and remain in that state.

original: rnams // spyod pa mchog dang ldan zhing byams pa'i rjes song brtson 'grus brtan pas rnam gnon cing //
analyzed: rnams // spyod pa mchog dang ldan zhing byams pa'i rjes song brtson 'grus brtan pas rnam gnon cing //
translated: They are endowed with the highest conduct, follow love, and are steadfast through their stable diligence.

original: tshul khrims mi g-yo dbugs phyin de dag 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par byed //
analyzed: tshul khrims mi g-yo dbugs phyin de dag 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par byed //
translated: They are unshakable in their discipline and bring all beings to spiritual maturity.

original: lung bstan rab tu thob nas rgyal sras rnams kyi spyod pa tshul bzhin thob par byed //
analyzed: lung bstan rab tu thob nas rgyal sras rnams kyi spyod pa tshul bzhin thob par byed //
translated: Having attained the prophecy, they properly attain the conduct of the victors’ heirs.

original: sangs rgyas yon tan dag la zhugs kyang sems can sems dang zhing la sems pa byed //
analyzed: sangs rgyas yon tan dag la zhugs kyang sems can sems dang zhing la sems pa byed //
translated: Though they are engaged in the buddhas’ qualities, they think of beings’ minds and fields.

original: bskal pa'i dus la 'jug pa'i ye shes ldan zhing mkhas pa skyo ba'i 'du shes med //
analyzed: bskal pa'i dus la 'jug pa'i ye shes ldan zhing mkhas pa skyo ba'i 'du shes med //
translated: They have the wisdom to engage in the eons and are skilled and free of the notion of weariness.

original: gzungs kyi tshul dang yang dag tha dad stobs rnams thob cing yang dag don gyis rgyal //
analyzed: gzungs kyi tshul dang yang dag tha dad stobs rnams thob cing yang dag don gyis rgyal //
translated: They have attained the dhāraṇī approach, the powers, and the correct distinctions, and are victorious through the true meaning.

original: bstan pa mtshungs med sems kyis mkhas pa byang chub zhi ba rnam par 'tshang yang rgya //
analyzed: bstan pa mtshungs med sems kyis mkhas pa byang chub zhi ba rnam par 'tshang yang rgya //
translated: The wise ones, with their incomparable teaching, will also fully awaken to the peace of enlightenment.

original: sems kyi spyod pa thams cad bzang po'i yon tan spyod pa'i mchog tu smon pa byed //
analyzed: sems kyi spyod pa thams cad bzang po'i yon tan spyod pa'i mchog tu smon pa byed //
translated: They aspire to all the activities of the mind being the supreme conduct of excellent qualities.

original: snying rje'i rkyen dang byams pa mchog rten byang chub dam pa sbyong bar byed dang ldan //
analyzed: snying rje'i rkyen dang byams pa mchog rten byang chub dam pa sbyong bar byed dang ldan //
translated: They are endowed with the conditions of compassion and supreme love, and they train in the highest enlightenment.

original: brtson pas pha rol phyin rtogs rab tu mkhas shing skyo ba'i pha rol phyin gyur pas //
analyzed: brtson pas pha rol phyin rtogs rab tu mkhas shing skyo ba'i pha rol phyin gyur pas //
translated: Through diligence, they attain the perfections, are very skilled, and go beyond weariness.

original: khyu mchog mos dang rab tu rtogs pa'i stobs thob byang chub dam pa mngon 'tshang rgya //
analyzed: khyu mchog mos dang rab tu rtogs pa'i stobs thob byang chub dam pa mngon 'tshang rgya //
translated: Having attained the power of aspiration and realization, they fully awaken to the highest enlightenment.

original: mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa thob cing ye shes tshul gyis chos mchog ston byed pa //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa thob cing ye shes tshul gyis chos mchog ston byed pa //
translated: They attain equality through sameness and teach the supreme Dharma through the way of wisdom.

original: yon tan thob byed spobs dang ldan pa de dag chos kyi dbang phyug mchog tu 'gyur //
analyzed: yon tan thob byed spobs dang ldan pa de dag chos kyi dbang phyug mchog tu 'gyur //
translated: Endowed with eloquence that brings about the attainment of good qualities, they become supreme lords of the Dharma.

original: dbang la gnas kyang gnas pa med pas mnyam pa med @19b pa'i sems kyi 'brug sgra sgrogs //
analyzed: dbang la gnas kyang gnas pa med pas mnyam pa med @19b pa'i sems kyi 'brug sgra sgrogs //
translated: Though abiding in power, they are without abode, and roar the unequaled thunder of the mind.

original: ye shes mchog dang de bzhin gshegs sprul sgrub cing byang chub zhi ba nye bar 'gro /
analyzed: ye shes mchog dang de bzhin gshegs sprul sgrub cing byang chub zhi ba nye bar 'gro /
translated: They accomplish supreme wisdom and emanations of the Tathagata, and approach the peace of enlightenment.

original: mkhas pa de dag bskal pa 'byams klas byin rlabs shes pas dbugs phyin rab tu thob //
analyzed: mkhas pa de dag bskal pa 'byams klas byin rlabs shes pas dbugs phyin rab tu thob //
translated: Those wise ones, through the knowledge of blessings that extends throughout the vast eons, attain complete relief.

original: zab la gnas pas brtan par 'gro na gnas shing nem nur bsal bas mkhas pa rnams //
analyzed: zab la gnas pas brtan par 'gro na gnas shing nem nur bsal bas mkhas pa rnams //
translated: If he goes to a place that is deep and stable, he will be wise in dispelling doubt by remaining there.🔽

original: ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyi dgongs pa mkhas shing rnam phye pha rol phyin //
analyzed: ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyi dgongs pa mkhas shing rnam phye pha rol phyin //
translated: They are stable because they are profound and steadfast. They are wise because they are skilled in the intent of the Dharma and have perfected it.

original: snyoms par 'jug pa'i ye shes yul la zhugs nas thams cad mkhyen par 'tshang yang rgya //
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa'i ye shes yul la zhugs nas thams cad mkhyen par 'tshang yang rgya //
translated: They are omniscient because they have entered the domain of wisdom and meditative absorption.

original: ye shes rnam thar kun gyi pha rol phyin cing mngon par shes pas rnam par rtsen //
analyzed: ye shes rnam thar kun gyi pha rol phyin cing mngon par shes pas rnam par rtsen //
translated: They have perfected all wisdom and liberation and are skilled in the superknowledges.

original: rig pa'i snang ldan rnam grol nyon mongs bral bas 'gro la skyed mos tshal dang 'dra //
analyzed: rig pa'i snang ldan rnam grol nyon mongs bral bas 'gro la skyed mos tshal dang 'dra //
translated: They are like a garden for beings because they are endowed with the light of knowledge, are liberated, and are free from afflictions.

original: gang la dkar ba'i spyod pa'i gzhal med khang mdzes sna tshogs spyod pa ston pa po; ;'gro ba kun la rgyan rnams du ma rab tu ston kyang sems las g-yo ba med //
analyzed: gang la dkar ba'i spyod pa'i gzhal med khang mdzes sna tshogs spyod pa ston pa po; ;'gro ba kun la rgyan rnams du ma rab tu ston kyang sems las g-yo ba med //
translated: They are the ones who display the beautiful and various palaces of virtuous conduct, who display many ornaments to all beings without moving from the mind,

original: bsam pa shin tu shes pas bstan pa rab tu mkhas shing pha rol phyin 'gyur bas //
analyzed: bsam pa shin tu shes pas bstan pa rab tu mkhas shing pha rol phyin 'gyur bas //
translated: and who are skilled in teaching because they know the thoughts of beings and have perfected the perfections.

original: mkhas pa dag ni dag cing sbyangs ba'i byang chub phyag rgya snang ba'i ye shes kyis //
analyzed: mkhas pa dag ni dag cing sbyangs ba'i byang chub phyag rgya snang ba'i ye shes kyis //
translated: The wise ones, with the pristine, purified, enlightening wisdom of the appearance of the seal,

original: 'gro ba dag dang mi mtshungs zhum med khyu mchog lhag pa'i bsam pa ri bo 'dra //
analyzed: 'gro ba dag dang mi mtshungs zhum med khyu mchog lhag pa'i bsam pa ri bo 'dra //
translated: are not the same as the world. They are the fearless, supreme leader, with the superior intention like a mountain.

original: ye shes rgya mtsho 'dra dang yon tan mi zad don du spyod pa chen po spyod //
analyzed: ye shes rgya mtsho 'dra dang yon tan mi zad don du spyod pa chen po spyod //
translated: They are like an ocean of wisdom, with inexhaustible qualities, practicing the great meaning.

original: de dag rin chen 'dra ba'i gnas la rdo rje lta bu'i go cha bgos pas gnas //🔽shin tu rgya chen rtsom la rab tu mkhas shing 'gro @20a *//
analyzed: de dag rin chen 'dra ba'i gnas la rdo rje lta bu'i go cha bgos pas gnas // shin tu rgya chen rtsom la rab tu mkhas shing 'gro @20a *//
translated: They are like a jewel, dwelling in the place, wearing the armor like a vajra.

original: ba kun na thub pa med //
analyzed: ba kun na thub pa med //
translated: They are very skilled in the vast undertaking, with no rival in the world.

original: byang chub mchog tu lung bstan skyon med khong du chud pa'i rgya chen sems la gnas //
analyzed: byang chub mchog tu lung bstan skyon med khong du chud pa'i rgya chen sems la gnas //
translated: They dwell in the vast mind of the prediction of supreme enlightenment, with the faultless understanding.

original: sangs rgyas gter mchog mi zad thob nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas gter mchog mi zad thob nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: Having attained the inexhaustible supreme treasure of the Buddha, they become omniscient.

original: rtag tu kun rdzob shes pas dbang 'gyur rnam par 'phrul ba rnams la mkhas pas na //
analyzed: rtag tu kun rdzob shes pas dbang 'gyur rnam par 'phrul ba rnams la mkhas pas na //
translated: Always having power over conventional knowledge, they are skilled in the emanations.

original: zhing rnams kun dang chos kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i ye shes rgyud la gnas //
analyzed: zhing rnams kun dang chos kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i ye shes rgyud la gnas //
translated: The wisdom of the buddhas’ manifestations in all realms and in the field of phenomena is present in their mind streams.

original: lus dang smon lam spyod yul ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa la yang de bzhin te //
analyzed: lus dang smon lam spyod yul ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa la yang de bzhin te //
translated: Their bodies, aspirations, fields of experience, and wisdom manifestations are the same.

original: 'gro ba dag la rnam par rtse ba bye ba khrag khrig du ma mang po ston //
analyzed: 'gro ba dag la rnam par rtse ba bye ba khrag khrig du ma mang po ston //
translated: They display many quintillions of different kinds of play for beings.

original: mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis rnam par 'phrul zhing nges par rnam par rtse //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis rnam par 'phrul zhing nges par rnam par rtse //
translated: They manifest through the power of their higher cognitions and miraculous abilities.

original: khyu mchog de dag sangs rgyas yul la stobs thob 'gro ba kun gyis thub pa med //
analyzed: khyu mchog de dag sangs rgyas yul la stobs thob 'gro ba kun gyis thub pa med //
translated: Those supreme leaders have attained the power of the buddhas’ field of experience and are invincible to all beings.

original: mkhas pa 'jigs pa med dang bag tsha med dang ma 'dres rnams kyis shin tu brgyan //
analyzed: mkhas pa 'jigs pa med dang bag tsha med dang ma 'dres rnams kyis shin tu brgyan //
translated: They are adorned with the wisdom of the fearless, the unashamed, and the unmixed.

original: sangs rgyas sras dag las rnams thams cad byed cing shin tu mdzes pa'i lus dang ldan //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sras dag las rnams thams cad byed cing shin tu mdzes pa'i lus dang ldan //
translated: The buddhas’ heirs perform all their activities with bodies that are extremely beautiful.

original: de dag lus kyi las kyi dngos po shin tu rgya che dag kyang dag cing dge /
analyzed: de dag lus kyi las kyi dngos po shin tu rgya che dag kyang dag cing dge /
translated: Their physical actions are vast, pure, and virtuous.

original: de yang 'byin pa'i tshe na rgyal bas byin gyis brlabs shing las ni mchog kyang byed; ;dam pa de dag sems bskyed gcig la sems rgyas byed pa'i sems kyang rab tu ston //
analyzed: de yang 'byin pa'i tshe na rgyal bas byin gyis brlabs shing las ni mchog kyang byed; ;dam pa de dag sems bskyed gcig la sems rgyas byed pa'i sems kyang rab tu ston //
translated: “When they are born, they are blessed by the jinas and they perform supreme activities. Those supreme ones also teach the mind that increases the mind of awakening in a single instant.

original: rgyal ba'i dbang po thob pas rtag tu dbang po'i ting 'dzin dbang la rab tu @20b gnas //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i dbang po thob pas rtag tu dbang po'i ting 'dzin dbang la rab tu @20b gnas //
translated: “They always attain the samādhi of the lord of the jinas and the power of the lord of the jinas.

original: bsam bdag cing g-yo rgyu rnams dang bral te lhag pa'i bsam pa mngon sum gyur //
analyzed: bsam bdag cing g-yo rgyu rnams dang bral te lhag pa'i bsam pa mngon sum gyur //
translated: They are free of deceit and hypocrisy and have a pure superior motivation.

original: mos pa'i 'jug pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad 'gro ba dag la rab tu ston //
analyzed: mos pa'i 'jug pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad 'gro ba dag la rab tu ston //
translated: They teach the various different kinds of engagement in devotion to beings.

original: bag chags thams cad spangs nas spyod pa dam pa rab tu 'dzin //
analyzed: bag chags thams cad spangs nas spyod pa dam pa rab tu 'dzin //
translated: They abandon all traces and maintain the supreme conduct.

original: nan tan bya ba grub pa'i ye shes mkhas pas thams cad mkhyen par 'tshang yang rgya //
analyzed: nan tan bya ba grub pa'i ye shes mkhas pas thams cad mkhyen par 'tshang yang rgya //
translated: They are skilled in the wisdom of accomplishing the practice and attain omniscience.

original: bsam pa rnam par spangs nas de dag skyon med gnas pa zhi ba mchog kyang 'thob //
analyzed: bsam pa rnam par spangs nas de dag skyon med gnas pa zhi ba mchog kyang 'thob //
translated: They abandon thoughts and attain the supreme peace of remaining in the absence of faults.

original: mkhas pa 'di lam shin tu bslabs pa de dag ming ni yon tan sgo nas grags //
analyzed: mkhas pa 'di lam shin tu bslabs pa de dag ming ni yon tan sgo nas grags //
translated: The wise ones who are well trained in this path are renowned by their qualities.

original: mtha' yas sems kyi yul ldan gnas pa med par lam rnams yang du sgom pa byed //
analyzed: mtha' yas sems kyi yul ldan gnas pa med par lam rnams yang du sgom pa byed //
translated: They are established in the infinite sphere of the mind and meditate on the path without abiding.

original: ye shes tshul la gnas shing 'gro ba rnams la lam gyi rgyan rnams shin tu ston //
analyzed: ye shes tshul la gnas shing 'gro ba rnams la lam gyi rgyan rnams shin tu ston //
translated: They are established in the way of wisdom and perfectly teach the ornaments of the path to beings.

original: spyod pa lag pa lta bu dag dang ldan pa lto yin snying po ye shes mchog /
analyzed: spyod pa lag pa lta bu dag dang ldan pa lto yin snying po ye shes mchog /
translated: They have conduct that is like hands, a belly that is the supreme essence of wisdom,

original: snying ni rdo rje lta bu snying rje'i go bgos ye shes gdab pa'i mtshon cha yin //
analyzed: snying ni rdo rje lta bu snying rje'i go bgos ye shes gdab pa'i mtshon cha yin //
translated: a heart that is like a vajra, the armor of compassion, and the weapon of wisdom.

original: shes rab mgo ste chos rtogs mig yin byang chub spyod pa yang ni rna ba yin; ;tshul khrims dag cing nyon mongs med la gtsang ste mun bzhi byed sna yin te //
analyzed: shes rab mgo ste chos rtogs mig yin byang chub spyod pa yang ni rna ba yin; ;tshul khrims dag cing nyon mongs med la gtsang ste mun bzhi byed sna yin te //
translated: Wisdom is the head, the realization of the Dharma is the eyes, and the conduct of awakening is the ears. Pure discipline, the absence of afflictions, and purity are the nose that creates light.

original: spobs pa lce yin lus ni rig pa yin te sems ni ye shes dam pa yin //
analyzed: spobs pa lce yin lus ni rig pa yin te sems ni ye shes dam pa yin //
translated: Eloquence is the tongue, the body is knowledge, and the mind is the highest wisdom.

original: spyod pa rgyu ba yin te byang chub shing gnas seng ge'i khri ni 'dug pa yin //
analyzed: spyod pa rgyu ba yin te byang chub shing gnas seng ge'i khri ni 'dug pa yin //
translated: Conduct is movement, the tree of awakening is the seat, and the lion throne is the abode.

original: tshangs pa'i lam rnams dag ni lam yin stong pa chags med dam pa spyod yul lo //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i lam rnams dag ni lam yin stong pa chags med dam pa spyod yul lo //
translated: The path of Brahmā is the path; the realm of emptiness is the supreme conduct.

original: gang gis de dag @21a *//
analyzed: gang gis de dag @21a *//
translated: Those who are

original: snang bar 'gyur ba'i snang ba bde bar gshegs kyi ye shes yul //
analyzed: snang bar 'gyur ba'i snang ba bde bar gshegs kyi ye shes yul //
translated: illuminated by that light are the objects of the Sugata’s wisdom.

original: sems can spyod la rnam par lta ba ye shes mchog ste rnam pa sna tshogs bsgyings //
analyzed: sems can spyod la rnam par lta ba ye shes mchog ste rnam pa sna tshogs bsgyings //
translated: The supreme wisdom that observes the conduct of beings is the various displays.

original: sems can dben zhing chags dang bral ba'i sbyin pa bsnyems pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang // bzod pa mi 'khrugs brtson 'grus mi ldog dbang bsgyur ba ni bsam gtan dam pa yin; ;rgyu ba med cing nam mkha' 'dra ba shes rab byams pa sems can rnam par 'dren //
analyzed: sems can dben zhing chags dang bral ba'i sbyin pa bsnyems pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang // bzod pa mi 'khrugs brtson 'grus mi ldog dbang bsgyur ba ni bsam gtan dam pa yin; ;rgyu ba med cing nam mkha' 'dra ba shes rab byams pa sems can rnam par 'dren //
translated: The generosity of beings being isolated and free of attachment, the morality of being without pride, the patience of being unperturbed, the diligence of being irreversible, the supreme concentration of being in control, the wisdom of being without movement and being like space, and love are the guides of beings.

original: skyo ba med snying rje rnam dag chos ni dga' ba nyon mongs gnas las btang yang snyoms //
analyzed: skyo ba med snying rje rnam dag chos ni dga' ba nyon mongs gnas las btang yang snyoms //
translated: The Dharma of being without weariness, of pure compassion, of joy, and of being without attachment to the abodes of affliction is equanimity.

original: don ni zhi ba chos kyi yul la nye bar 'gro ba bsod nams 'gro la bsngos //
analyzed: don ni zhi ba chos kyi yul la nye bar 'gro ba bsod nams 'gro la bsngos //
translated: The meaning of peace is the object of the Dharma, and merit is dedicated to beings.

original: ye shes tshogs ni ral gri rnon po lta bu snang ba chen po rig pa ste //
analyzed: ye shes tshogs ni ral gri rnon po lta bu snang ba chen po rig pa ste //
translated: The accumulation of wisdom is like a sharp sword, the great light of awareness.

original: 'gro ba rnams la thos pa ston pas mi ngoms bskal par 'dren kyang 'jigs pa med //
analyzed: 'gro ba rnams la thos pa ston pas mi ngoms bskal par 'dren kyang 'jigs pa med //
translated: Even if they lead beings for an eon, they are never exhausted in teaching the Dharma, and they are fearless.

original: nan tan byed la gnas te bdud rnams btul nas bdud kyi lam yang rab tu bcad //
analyzed: nan tan byed la gnas te bdud rnams btul nas bdud kyi lam yang rab tu bcad //
translated: They are established in practice, and having subdued the demons, they cut off the path of the demons.

original: rgyal ba rnams kyi 'phrin las gang yin ye shes spyod pa lhag pa'i bsam pas 'dzin //
analyzed: rgyal ba rnams kyi 'phrin las gang yin ye shes spyod pa lhag pa'i bsam pas 'dzin //
translated: They hold the activity of the jinas, the conduct of wisdom, and the superior intention.

original: nga rgyal las rnams rnam par spangs te rtag tu ye shes kyi yang bya ba byed //
analyzed: nga rgyal las rnams rnam par spangs te rtag tu ye shes kyi yang bya ba byed //
translated: They abandon pride and its actions, and they always perform the activity of wisdom.

original: bdud rnams byin gyis brlabs bcom mkhas pa de dag sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs kyis 'phags //
analyzed: bdud rnams byin gyis brlabs bcom mkhas pa de dag sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs kyis 'phags //
translated: Those wise ones, having conquered the blessings of the demons, are exalted by the blessings of the buddhas.

original: chos kyi byin gyi rlabs thob blo gros chen po 'chang ba lha yi gnas su 'dong //
analyzed: chos kyi byin gyi rlabs thob blo gros chen po 'chang ba lha yi gnas su 'dong //
translated: They attain the blessings of the Dharma and hold great intelligence, and they go to the realm of the gods.

original: lha rnams @21b byas te 'chi 'phos song nas mchog gi mngal ni shin tu phra bar 'gro /
analyzed: lha rnams @21b byas te 'chi 'phos song nas mchog gi mngal ni shin tu phra bar 'gro /
translated: Having gone to the realm of the gods, they pass away and enter the supreme, subtle womb.

original: skye ba mchog ni nye bar bstan nas mchog gi gom pa bdun ni 'dor bar byed //
analyzed: skye ba mchog ni nye bar bstan nas mchog gi gom pa bdun ni 'dor bar byed //
translated: They display the supreme birth and take the supreme seven steps.

original: mkhas pa de dag sems can kun la bzo dang spyod dang btsun mo'i 'khor kyang ston //
analyzed: mkhas pa de dag sems can kun la bzo dang spyod dang btsun mo'i 'khor kyang ston //
translated: The wise ones teach the arts, conduct, and the retinue of queens to all beings.

original: chags pa med par mngon par byung nas byang chub shing drung chos kyi rgyan kyang byed //
analyzed: chags pa med par mngon par byung nas byang chub shing drung chos kyi rgyan kyang byed //
translated: They manifest without attachment and make the Dharma their ornament in the presence of the Bodhi tree.

original: stong pa stan las 'od zer dra ba yangs pa skye zhing yang dag bskul ba byed //
analyzed: stong pa stan las 'od zer dra ba yangs pa skye zhing yang dag bskul ba byed //
translated: From the seat of emptiness, they emit a vast net of light rays and inspire.

original: bdud rnams btul te byang chub go 'phang sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
analyzed: bdud rnams btul te byang chub go 'phang sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
translated: They tame Mara, attain the stage of enlightenment, and turn the wheel of the Dharma of the Buddha.

original: sangs rgyas sa yang rab tu bstan nas 'dren pa de dag mtshungs pa med par bzhud //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sa yang rab tu bstan nas 'dren pa de dag mtshungs pa med par bzhud //
translated: Having fully revealed the stage of the Buddha, those guides proceed to the incomparable.

original: gang gis mkhas pa bskal pa bye bar rnam par rtse zhing yang dag byung gyur nas //
analyzed: gang gis mkhas pa bskal pa bye bar rnam par rtse zhing yang dag byung gyur nas //
translated: The wise ones, having played and emerged for ten million eons,

original: sems can bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma sangs rgyas yon tan rab 'god kyang //
analyzed: sems can bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma sangs rgyas yon tan rab 'god kyang //
translated: establish many quintillions of beings in the qualities of the Buddha.

original: rnam pa kun du sems can mi gnas chos la ma yin spyod la ma yin pa'i //
analyzed: rnam pa kun du sems can mi gnas chos la ma yin spyod la ma yin pa'i //
translated: They are not attached to sentient beings, to phenomena, or to conduct.

original: de dag gi ni spyod pa 'di 'dra mtha' yas shin tu rgya chen mdor bstan te //
analyzed: de dag gi ni spyod pa 'di 'dra mtha' yas shin tu rgya chen mdor bstan te //
translated: This is a brief description of the conduct of these bodhisattvas, which is infinite and vast.

original: de 'dra'i spyod dang ldan pa'i ye shes khyu mchog rdzu 'phrul dag gis rnam par rtse //🔽zhing rnams bye ba stong yang skra rtse gcig la bskal pa khrag khrig brgyar 'dzin te //
analyzed: de 'dra'i spyod dang ldan pa'i ye shes khyu mchog rdzu 'phrul dag gis rnam par rtse // zhing rnams bye ba stong yang skra rtse gcig la bskal pa khrag khrig brgyar 'dzin te //
translated: Bodhisattvas who engage in such conduct, with their knowledge, play with their miraculous powers.🔽They hold a billion worlds on the tip of a single hair for a trillion eons.

original: lag tu khyer te zhing rnams bye bar 'gro yang lus la'ang ngal dub gang yang med //
analyzed: lag tu khyer te zhing rnams bye bar 'gro yang lus la'ang ngal dub gang yang med //
translated: They carry them in their hands and go to a billion worlds, yet their bodies are not at all fatigued.

original: mkhas pas khyer nas ji lta'i gnas su bkod kyang 'gro ba dag la gnod pa med //
analyzed: mkhas pas khyer nas ji lta'i gnas su bkod kyang 'gro ba dag la gnod pa med //
translated: The wise ones carry them and place them wherever they wish, yet they do not harm sentient beings.

original: 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i zhing gi rgyan rnams ji snyed rnam pa tha dad bstan pa dag /🔽kun kyang ba @22a *//
analyzed: 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i zhing gi rgyan rnams ji snyed rnam pa tha dad bstan pa dag / kun kyang ba @22a *//
translated: All the various displays of the fields of the knowers of the world🔽are shown

original: sbu gcig gi bu gar khyu mchog de dag yang dag rab tu ston //
analyzed: sbu gcig gi bu gar khyu mchog de dag yang dag rab tu ston //
translated: in the pores of a single hair by those supreme beings.

original: mkhas pa ba spu'i bu gar rgya mtsho chu rnams ma lus khong chud rab ston kyang //🔽'phel zhing 'grib med 'gro ba dag la gnod par 'gyur med bya ba de yang ston //
analyzed: mkhas pa ba spu'i bu gar rgya mtsho chu rnams ma lus khong chud rab ston kyang // 'phel zhing 'grib med 'gro ba dag la gnod par 'gyur med bya ba de yang ston //
translated: The wise ones can display in a pore of their skin all the waters of the oceans without increasing the waters or disturbing the world.

original: khor yug khrag khrig shin tu phra ba'i rdul byas lag gis bsdus khyer zhing //🔽zhing rnams khrag khrig bye ma snyed du 'dor byed gcig tu gnyis kyang gzhog mi byed //🔽zhing rnams de dag rdul du byas te de bzhin gzhan yang rnam par 'jig byed de //
analyzed: khor yug khrag khrig shin tu phra ba'i rdul byas lag gis bsdus khyer zhing // zhing rnams khrag khrig bye ma snyed du 'dor byed gcig tu gnyis kyang gzhog mi byed // zhing rnams de dag rdul du byas te de bzhin gzhan yang rnam par 'jig byed de //
translated: They can take in their hand a trichiliocosm and cast it into another universe without enlarging the hand or disturbing beings.🔽They can reduce to dust all the buddhafields as numerous as the sands of the Ganges and carry that dust to other universes without enlarging the dust or disturbing beings.

original: de 'dra'i rjes su dang ba zad par gyur kyang 'jug pa de dag mi zad do //
analyzed: de 'dra'i rjes su dang ba zad par gyur kyang 'jug pa de dag mi zad do //
translated: They can reduce to dust all the buddhafields and then reassemble them without increasing the dust or disturbing beings.

original: 'jig rten kun gyi nyi ma zla ba skar ma gang dag stong rnams ji snyed dang // gang yang nor bu'i 'od dang me yi 'od dang gang na gang rnams lha dbang 'od //
analyzed: 'jig rten kun gyi nyi ma zla ba skar ma gang dag stong rnams ji snyed dang // gang yang nor bu'i 'od dang me yi 'od dang gang na gang rnams lha dbang 'od //
translated: The light of the sun, moon, and stars in all the universes, the light of jewels, fire, and the gods,

original: mang po de dag rab tu 'das pa'i 'od zer khrag khrig spu gcig khung nas 'gyed //
analyzed: mang po de dag rab tu 'das pa'i 'od zer khrag khrig spu gcig khung nas 'gyed //
translated: From the pores of their bodies they emit quintillions of light rays,

original: 'jig rten kun gyi ngan song sdug bsngal zhi bar byed cing chos kyi dam pa ston //
analyzed: 'jig rten kun gyi ngan song sdug bsngal zhi bar byed cing chos kyi dam pa ston //
translated: Which pacify the sufferings of the lower realms in all worlds and teach the sublime Dharma.

original: 'gro ba ma lus sgra yi rnam pa sna tshogs skad rnams thams cad ji snyed pa //
analyzed: 'gro ba ma lus sgra yi rnam pa sna tshogs skad rnams thams cad ji snyed pa //
translated: All the various sounds and languages of all beings without exception

original: sku mchog de dag tshig gcig rab tu brjod pas sgra rnams thams cad tshang bar brjod //
analyzed: sku mchog de dag tshig gcig rab tu brjod pas sgra rnams thams cad tshang bar brjod //
translated: Are included in the expression of a single word from those supreme bodies.

original: srog chags bye ba rnams kyis yid du 'ong ba'i sgra thob dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur //
analyzed: srog chags bye ba rnams kyis yid du 'ong ba'i sgra thob dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur //
translated: Billions of beings hear that pleasant sound and are delighted and satisfied.

original: rgyal bas bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam pa ji snyed thams cad de las thos par 'gyur //🔽gang yang ji snyed @22b 'das pa'i bskal pa yod pa de dag ma 'ongs bskal par ston //
analyzed: rgyal bas bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam pa ji snyed thams cad de las thos par 'gyur // gang yang ji snyed @22b 'das pa'i bskal pa yod pa de dag ma 'ongs bskal par ston //
translated: They hear all the aspects of the Dharma taught by the Victorious Ones.🔽All the past eons that there are, they teach in future eons,

original: gang yang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba ji snyed de dag 'das par ston //
analyzed: gang yang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba ji snyed de dag 'das par ston //
translated: And all the future and present eons, they teach in the past.

original: khyu mchog dag ni zhing rnams 'tshig dang gnas pa rnam pa tha dad ston pa byed //
analyzed: khyu mchog dag ni zhing rnams 'tshig dang gnas pa rnam pa tha dad ston pa byed //
translated: The best of leaders show the burning and the flourishing of the fields.

original: 'gro ba ji snyed thams cad mkhas pa de dag skra rtse gcig la rab tu 'god //
analyzed: 'gro ba ji snyed thams cad mkhas pa de dag skra rtse gcig la rab tu 'god //
translated: All the beings in the world, the wise ones place them on a single hair.

original: 'das dang ma byon pa dang phyogs bcu kun na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba ji snyed pa //
analyzed: 'das dang ma byon pa dang phyogs bcu kun na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba ji snyed pa //
translated: All the Victorious Ones who have come in the past, who are present now, and who will come in the future,

original: de dag thams cad rang gi lus las ma nor dbang bsgyur rnam par 'phrul pa ston //
analyzed: de dag thams cad rang gi lus las ma nor dbang bsgyur rnam par 'phrul pa ston //
translated: They all appear in a single body, without error, with mastery, and with emanations.

original: sprul pa'i byin gyi rlabs la shes pa'i mkhas pa de dag 'gro ba ji snyed sems //
analyzed: sprul pa'i byin gyi rlabs la shes pa'i mkhas pa de dag 'gro ba ji snyed sems //
translated: The wise ones who know the blessing of emanations, they show the minds of all beings.

original: de snyed lus rnams rdul dang bral ba ston kyang lus la gnas pa gang yang med //
analyzed: de snyed lus rnams rdul dang bral ba ston kyang lus la gnas pa gang yang med //
translated: They show as many bodies as there are atoms, but there is no body that is present.

original: lam rgyud drug po gang rnams ji snyed yod pa'i 'gro ba kun gyi lus bsdus shing //
analyzed: lam rgyud drug po gang rnams ji snyed yod pa'i 'gro ba kun gyi lus bsdus shing //
translated: All the bodies of beings in the six classes of existence,

original: brgya byin tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mgon po rnams dang de bzhin lha dang mi yi rnams //
analyzed: brgya byin tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mgon po rnams dang de bzhin lha dang mi yi rnams //
translated: The lords of the world, Indra, Brahma, and likewise gods and humans,

original: gang yang nyan thos rang rgyal rnams la dad cing sangs rgyas sku la mos pa la //
analyzed: gang yang nyan thos rang rgyal rnams la dad cing sangs rgyas sku la mos pa la //
translated: And they have faith in the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas, and devotion to the buddhas’ bodies.

original: sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub pa'i spyod pa dag dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa ston //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub pa'i spyod pa dag dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa ston //
translated: They show the conduct that leads to the accomplishment of buddhahood and the conduct of omniscience.

original: 'gro ba kun gyi 'du shes dra ba rab dang 'bring dang tha mar 'jug pa rnams //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun gyi 'du shes dra ba rab dang 'bring dang tha mar 'jug pa rnams //
translated: The webs of perceptions of all beings, whether inferior, middling, or superior,

original: thams cad shes shing byin rlob byang chub 'tshang rgya zhing rnams kun kyang rab tu ston //
analyzed: thams cad shes shing byin rlob byang chub 'tshang rgya zhing rnams kun kyang rab tu ston //
translated: They know them all, and they manifest them, and they show them all in the buddha-fields.

original: 'du shes dra ba rnams bsgoms blo ldan 'jig rten 'du shes rnams la dbang bsgyur ba //
analyzed: 'du shes dra ba rnams bsgoms blo ldan 'jig rten 'du shes rnams la dbang bsgyur ba //
translated: The wise ones, who have meditated on the webs of perceptions, have power over the perceptions of the world.

original: bya ba dang ni sbyor ba ji snyed pa dang kun mchog byang @23a *//
analyzed: bya ba dang ni sbyor ba ji snyed pa dang kun mchog byang @23a *//
translated: Whatever actions there are, and whatever applications, and the supreme of all,

original: chub spyod pa sten //
analyzed: chub spyod pa sten //
translated: The conduct of enlightenment,

original: de dag de dang rnam par 'phrul pa shin tu rgya chen dam pa gzhan yang ston //
analyzed: de dag de dang rnam par 'phrul pa shin tu rgya chen dam pa gzhan yang ston //
translated: They show that and other excellent, vast, and supreme emanations.

original: de dag gang la 'jig rten sa min pa dang yul min de dag bya ba ston //
analyzed: de dag gang la 'jig rten sa min pa dang yul min de dag bya ba ston //
translated: Whatever is not the world, and is not a domain, they show that as an action.

original: ston kyang bya ba lhur len ma yin gzhan yang phyir zhing gong du ston pa byed //
analyzed: ston kyang bya ba lhur len ma yin gzhan yang phyir zhing gong du ston pa byed //
translated: They are not teachers who are preoccupied with their own activities, but rather they are teachers who are ever more elevated.

original: de dag sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji bzhin spyod pa ci bzhin yang dag 'jug /
analyzed: de dag sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji bzhin spyod pa ci bzhin yang dag 'jug /
translated: They are engaged in the correct practice in accordance with the aspirations of sentient beings.

original: lus ni nam mkha' lta bu dag dang yid la chags med 'jig rten gsum gyi gtso //
analyzed: lus ni nam mkha' lta bu dag dang yid la chags med 'jig rten gsum gyi gtso //
translated: Their bodies are like space, and their minds are free from attachment, and they are the foremost in the three worlds.

original: tshul khrims spos kyi byug pa rab tu zhi ba gos yin yon tan sna tshogs rgyan //
analyzed: tshul khrims spos kyi byug pa rab tu zhi ba gos yin yon tan sna tshogs rgyan //
translated: Their perfume is discipline, their clothing is peace, and their ornaments are their various good qualities.

original: chos kyi go 'phang skyon med thob cing thams cad mkhyen pa yid bzhin nor bu ste //
analyzed: chos kyi go 'phang skyon med thob cing thams cad mkhyen pa yid bzhin nor bu ste //
translated: They have attained the faultless state of Dharma, and the wish-fulfilling jewel is their omniscience.

original: bde gshegs kun gyi ye shes dbang bskur thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal po'i thabs la gnas //🔽pha rol phyin pa rtag 'byung 'khor lo yin te glang po mngon par shes pa mchog /
analyzed: bde gshegs kun gyi ye shes dbang bskur thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal po'i thabs la gnas // pha rol phyin pa rtag 'byung 'khor lo yin te glang po mngon par shes pa mchog /
translated: They are consecrated with the wisdom of all the sugatas, and they abide in the state of the omniscient king.🔽The perfection of wisdom is their constant wheel, and their supreme higher perception is their elephant.

original: ye shes rdzu 'phrul rta ste chags pa med 'gro shes rab nor bu dam pa yin //
analyzed: ye shes rdzu 'phrul rta ste chags pa med 'gro shes rab nor bu dam pa yin //
translated: Their horse is the miraculous power of wisdom, and their excellent jewel is their unimpeded knowledge.

original: spyod pa btsun mo bzang mo bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi po khyim bdag dam pa'o //
analyzed: spyod pa btsun mo bzang mo bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi po khyim bdag dam pa'o //
translated: The four means of gathering [disciples] are the excellent queen.

original: thabs la shin tu mkhas pa blon po yin te mkhas pa de dag 'khor los bsgyur //
analyzed: thabs la shin tu mkhas pa blon po yin te mkhas pa de dag 'khor los bsgyur //
translated: The skillful means are the ministers. Those wise ones are the cakravartins.

original: stong pa khyim ste ting 'dzin grong khyer mchog yin byams dang snying rje'i go cha'o //
analyzed: stong pa khyim ste ting 'dzin grong khyer mchog yin byams dang snying rje'i go cha'o //
translated: Emptiness is the house. The city of the supreme samādhi is the armor of love and compassion.

original: shes rab ral gri yin te dran pa gzhu mdzes dbang po rno ba mda' yang yin //
analyzed: shes rab ral gri yin te dran pa gzhu mdzes dbang po rno ba mda' yang yin //
translated: Wisdom is the sword. Mindfulness is the beautiful bow. The sharp faculties are the arrows.

original: 'jig rten mkhyen pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs ni gdugs te /
analyzed: 'jig rten mkhyen pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs ni gdugs te /
translated: The blessings of the knowers of the world are the parasol.

original: @23b ye shes rgyal mtshan bsgreng //
analyzed: @23b ye shes rgyal mtshan bsgreng //
translated: The victory banner of wisdom is raised.

original: de dang de dag bzod pa'i stobs kyis bdud kyi dpung dang sde rnams 'dus pa 'joms //
analyzed: de dang de dag bzod pa'i stobs kyis bdud kyi dpung dang sde rnams 'dus pa 'joms //
translated: By the power of patience, they conquer the assembled armies and troops of Māra.

original: gzungs ni sa ste byang chub spyod pa chu klung ye shes lu ma shes rab shing; ;me tog byang chub yan lag ting nge 'dzin ni rta ste rdzu 'phrul rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: gzungs ni sa ste byang chub spyod pa chu klung ye shes lu ma shes rab shing; ;me tog byang chub yan lag ting nge 'dzin ni rta ste rdzu 'phrul rnam par brgyan //
translated: The dhāraṇīs are the earth. The bodhisattva conduct is the river. Wisdom is the tree. The branches of enlightenment are the flowers. Samādhi is the horse. The miracles are the ornaments.

original: stong pa rnam thar brgyan pa rdzing bu yin te rnam par dpyod pa bzang po btsun mo yin //
analyzed: stong pa rnam thar brgyan pa rdzing bu yin te rnam par dpyod pa bzang po btsun mo yin //
translated: The pond is the adornment of liberation through emptiness, and the queen is the excellent analysis.

original: thar pa bdud rtsi bza' ba yin te chos ni btung ba theg pa gsum gyis rtse //
analyzed: thar pa bdud rtsi bza' ba yin te chos ni btung ba theg pa gsum gyis rtse //
translated: The food is the nectar of liberation, and the drink is the Dharma, the peak of the three vehicles.

original: de dag spyod pa de 'dra yid 'ongs khyad par 'phags te de bas gong du mang //
analyzed: de dag spyod pa de 'dra yid 'ongs khyad par 'phags te de bas gong du mang //
translated: Such is the conduct of the bodhisattvas, which is sublime and superior, and even higher than that.

original: gang gi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong du skyo ba yongs su mi skyo bar //
analyzed: gang gi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong du skyo ba yongs su mi skyo bar //
translated: Those who, for quintillions of eons, are not discouraged and

original: ston pa mchod cing rnam dag zhing la brtson pas 'gro ba ye shes mchog la 'god //
analyzed: ston pa mchod cing rnam dag zhing la brtson pas 'gro ba ye shes mchog la 'god //
translated: worship the Teacher and strive for the pure realm, establishing beings in the highest wisdom,🔽are without any misdeeds, abide in wisdom, and expand omniscience.

original: kha na ma tho kun med ye shes rab gnas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rgyas byed; ;zhing rnams rdul gyi 'brur blags re re nas kyang 'grang zhing brtsi bar nus 'gyur la //
analyzed: kha na ma tho kun med ye shes rab gnas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rgyas byed; ;zhing rnams rdul gyi 'brur blags re re nas kyang 'grang zhing brtsi bar nus 'gyur la //
translated: It is possible to count the atoms in all the fields, one by one,

original: bar snang mkha' chen 'di yang skra yis gzhal te zad par bya bar nus srid de //
analyzed: bar snang mkha' chen 'di yang skra yis gzhal te zad par bya bar nus srid de //
translated: and it is possible to measure the great sky with a hair,🔽but it is not possible to measure the merit🔽of the one who has the thought of enlightenment.

original: skad cig gcig la 'gro ba rnams kyi sems ni bgrang tshul shes par nus srid kyi //
analyzed: skad cig gcig la 'gro ba rnams kyi sems ni bgrang tshul shes par nus srid kyi //
translated: In one instant, one could know the number of the minds of beings,

original: sangs rgyas sras rnams spyod pa dag ni bskal pa brgyar brjod zad par mi nus so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sras rnams spyod pa dag ni bskal pa brgyar brjod zad par mi nus so //
translated: but not, in a hundred aeons, the deeds of the Bodhisattvas.🔽Those who wish to attain these pure qualities, and those who wish for more,

original: gang zhig yon tan rnam dag 'di dag 'thob par 'dod cing gong du gzhan 'dod dang // gang zhig sdug bsngal rnams las 'gro ba thar byas bde la dgod par 'dod pa dang // gang zhig bde bar @24a *//
