translated: It was adorned with the king of jewels that illuminates all beings and with precious jewels that have many good qualities.

original: 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi phung pos shin tu brgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad las sgo gang dang / rta babs dang; pu shu dang / skar khung byas shing /
analyzed: 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi phung pos shin tu brgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad las sgo gang dang / rta babs dang; pu shu dang / skar khung byas shing /
translated: It was adorned with heaps of the Jambu River gold and with doors, archways, turrets, and windows made of all jewels.

original: khri 'phang grangs med pa rnam par dag pas brgyan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad dang 'dra ba'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang / 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i nor bu rin po che rnam par phye ba dang /🔽nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan rab tu bsgreng ba dang; sgo dang / rta babs thams cad las 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su rgyas par 'gengs pa rab tu 'byung bas rnam par mdzes par byas pa dang /
analyzed: khri 'phang grangs med pa rnam par dag pas brgyan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad dang 'dra ba'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang / 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i nor bu rin po che rnam par phye ba dang / nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan rab tu bsgreng ba dang; sgo dang / rta babs thams cad las 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su rgyas par 'gengs pa rab tu 'byung bas rnam par mdzes par byas pa dang /
translated: It was adorned with countless pure terraces, with ornaments of precious jewels like the lords of the world, and with the divisions of the precious jewels of the ocean of beings.🔽It was beautified by the rising of parasols and banners that were covered with nets of all precious jewels and by the radiance of light rays that filled the realm of phenomena from all the gates and archways.

original: phyi rol gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i gzhi stegs bu brjod du med pas brgyan pa dang / phyogs kun nas them skabs kyi phreng ba nor bu rin po ches brtsegs shing /🔽shin tu rnam par phye bas rab tu mdzes @30b par kun nas gnas par gyur to //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i gzhi stegs bu brjod du med pas brgyan pa dang / phyogs kun nas them skabs kyi phreng ba nor bu rin po ches brtsegs shing /🔽shin tu rnam par phye bas rab tu mdzes @30b par kun nas gnas par gyur to //
translated: The outer ground of the surrounding maṇḍala was adorned with an inexpressible number of platforms, and all around it there were rows of precious jewels that were well arranged and beautiful.

original: dze ta'i tshal thams cad kyang /
analyzed: dze ta'i tshal thams cad kyang /
translated: The entire Jeta Grove

original: chu zheng gab par shin tu yangs shing rgya che bar kun nas gnas par gyur te /
analyzed: chu zheng gab par shin tu yangs shing rgya che bar kun nas gnas par gyur te /
translated: became vast and wide, with a circumference of immeasurable extent.

original: sangs rgyas kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang /
translated: Through the power of the Buddha, as many buddha realms as there are atoms in an inexpressible number of buddha realms

original: chu zheng kun du rgya che zhing yangs pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: chu zheng kun du rgya che zhing yangs pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan zhing /
translated: became vast and wide in all directions, adorned with various ornaments of all jewels,

original: sa'i gzhi nor bu rin po che sna tshogs brjod du med pas kun nas grub pa dang / nor bu rin po che grangs med pa'i rva bas kun nas bskor ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing ta la'i phreng bas mdzes pas brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to //
analyzed: sa'i gzhi nor bu rin po che sna tshogs brjod du med pas kun nas grub pa dang / nor bu rin po che grangs med pa'i rva bas kun nas bskor ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing ta la'i phreng bas mdzes pas brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to //
translated: with a ground made of an inexpressible variety of precious jewels, surrounded by railings of countless precious jewels, and beautified by rows of palm trees made of various jewels.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na spos chu'i chu klung tshad med pa klong mtha' yas par 'khyil ba'i spos kyi chus yongs su gang ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na spos chu'i chu klung tshad med pa klong mtha' yas par 'khyil ba'i spos kyi chus yongs su gang ba /
translated: In those buddha-fields there were immeasurable rivers of perfumed water, filled with the water of perfumed water swirling in endless eddies,

original: rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog mang po dang 'dres par gyur la g-yas phyogs su 'khyil zhing 'bab pa /
analyzed: rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog mang po dang 'dres par gyur la g-yas phyogs su 'khyil zhing 'bab pa /
translated: flowing with rightward coils, mixed with many flowers of various jewels,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dbyangs su sgrog pas rab tu brgyan pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dbyangs su sgrog pas rab tu brgyan pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to //
translated: adorned with the sound of the voice of all the teachings of the Buddha.

original: rin po che'i me tog punda ri ka'i phreng ba dang / rin po che'i shing gam yo rin po che thams cad kyi padmo rab tu rgyas shing /
analyzed: rin po che'i me tog punda ri ka'i phreng ba dang / rin po che'i shing gam yo rin po che thams cad kyi padmo rab tu rgyas shing /
translated: There were garlands of jeweled flowers, and jeweled trees, with lotuses of all jewels fully blossomed,

original: shin tu 'phags pas mdzes par bkod pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i phreng ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa /
analyzed: shin tu 'phags pas mdzes par bkod pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i phreng ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa /
translated: beautifully arranged, and with garlands of inconceivable numbers of multi-storied palaces of various jewels, covered with nets of all precious jewels,

original: nor bu rin po che grangs med pa'i @31a *//
analyzed: nor bu rin po che grangs med pa'i @31a *//
translated: with countless precious jewels,

original: dra ba kun du snang bas brgyan cing mdzes pa dang / nor bu rin po che'i gzhal med khang nor bu rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa grangs med pa /
analyzed: dra ba kun du snang bas brgyan cing mdzes pa dang / nor bu rin po che'i gzhal med khang nor bu rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa grangs med pa /
translated: There were countless palaces made of precious jewels, adorned with all kinds of precious jewels,

original: spos thams cad kyi ngad kun nas 'byung ba /
analyzed: spos thams cad kyi ngad kun nas 'byung ba /
translated: with the fragrance of all kinds of incense wafting everywhere.

original: bdug spos kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang ldan pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to //
analyzed: bdug spos kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang ldan pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to //
translated: They were adorned with clouds of incense.

original: rin po che'i rgyal mtshan grangs med pa dang / gos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i snam bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / me tog gi rgyal mtshan dang / rgyan gyi rgyal mtshan dang / phreng ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /
analyzed: rin po che'i rgyal mtshan grangs med pa dang / gos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i snam bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / me tog gi rgyal mtshan dang / rgyan gyi rgyal mtshan dang / phreng ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /
translated: There were countless banners of precious jewels, banners of cloth, banners of flags, banners of precious silk, banners of flowers, banners of ornaments, banners of garlands,

original: rin po che sna tshogs kyi dril bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i rgyal po'i gdugs kyi rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che snang bas kun du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i dbyangs rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /
analyzed: rin po che sna tshogs kyi dril bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i rgyal po'i gdugs kyi rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che snang bas kun du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i dbyangs rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /
translated: the victory banner of various precious bells, the victory banner of the king of precious parasols, the victory banner of the precious jewel that fills everywhere with light, the victory banner of the king of precious jewels that proclaims the sound of the wheel of the names of all tathāgatas,

original: nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /
translated: the victory banner of the king of precious jewels that is the beautiful lion, the victory banner of the king of precious jewels that proclaims the past deeds of all tathāgatas, the victory banner of the king of precious jewels that illuminates the entire realm of phenomena,

original: rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan rnam par phye ba thams cad phyogs kun nas rgyan du gyur pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to //
analyzed: rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan rnam par phye ba thams cad phyogs kun nas rgyan du gyur pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to //
translated: All the ornaments of victory banners became ornaments in all directions.

original: dze ta'i tshal gyi nam mkha'i dbyings @31b thams cad kyang lha'i gzhal med khang gi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pas brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to //
analyzed: dze ta'i tshal gyi nam mkha'i dbyings @31b thams cad kyang lha'i gzhal med khang gi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pas brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to //
translated: The entire sky above Jetavana was adorned with an inconceivable cloud of celestial palaces.

original: dze ta'i tshal nyid kyang spos sna tshogs kyi shing grangs med pa'i sprin byis kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang / brjod du med pa'i rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyis kun nas 'khor cing bkod pa dang / rol mo brdung ba dang /
analyzed: dze ta'i tshal nyid kyang spos sna tshogs kyi shing grangs med pa'i sprin byis kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang / brjod du med pa'i rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyis kun nas 'khor cing bkod pa dang / rol mo brdung ba dang /
translated: Jetavana was covered and adorned with clouds of countless trees of various incenses and was arrayed with Sumeru mountains having inconceivable various ornaments.

original: dkrol ba brjod du med pa'i sprin las /
analyzed: dkrol ba brjod du med pa'i sprin las /
translated: From the clouds of innumerable musical instruments,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa'i dbyangs dang / nga ro snyan pa 'byung bas kun nas brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i padmo brjod du med pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i seng ge'i khri brjod du med pa'i steng lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i stan bting ba la byang chub sems dpa' 'khod cing /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa'i dbyangs dang / nga ro snyan pa 'byung bas kun nas brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i padmo brjod du med pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i seng ge'i khri brjod du med pa'i steng lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i stan bting ba la byang chub sems dpa' 'khod cing /
translated: It was adorned with the melodious songs and sweet sounds of praise to all the thus-gone ones, and it was covered and adorned with clouds of inexpressibly many precious lotuses.🔽It was adorned with clouds of inexpressibly many precious lion thrones, upon which were spread divine precious cushions upon which bodhisattvas were seated.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la bstod pa'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'byin pa'i sprin gyis kun nas brgyan pa dang / lha'i dbang po brjod du med pa'i gzugs brnyan mngon par 'byung ba'i nor bu rin po che'i 'bru'i sprin gyis kun nas brgyan pa dang / mu tig dkar po'i dra ba'i sprin brjod du med pas kun nas brgyan pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la bstod pa'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'byin pa'i sprin gyis kun nas brgyan pa dang / lha'i dbang po brjod du med pa'i gzugs brnyan mngon par 'byung ba'i nor bu rin po che'i 'bru'i sprin gyis kun nas brgyan pa dang / mu tig dkar po'i dra ba'i sprin brjod du med pas kun nas brgyan pa dang /
translated: It was adorned with clouds that emitted the sweet sounds of songs of praise to the thus-gone ones, and it was adorned with clouds of precious jewels that were the reflections of inexpressibly many lords of the gods. It was adorned with clouds of inexpressibly many nets of white pearls.

original: mu tig dmar po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin brjod du med pas kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang / rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i mu tig gi sprin brjod du med pa'i char mngon par 'bab pas rab tu brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to //
analyzed: mu tig dmar po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin brjod du med pas kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang / rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i mu tig gi sprin brjod du med pa'i char mngon par 'bab pas rab tu brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to //
translated: It was adorned with an inconceivable number of clouds of mansions made of red pearls, and it was also adorned with a rain of an inconceivable number of clouds of pearls as hard as diamond.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽de ni de bzhin @32a *//🔽gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / de ni de bzhin @32a *// gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Why was that?🔽Because of the inconceivable roots of virtue of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dkar po'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dkar po'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the inconceivable accumulation of good qualities of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang / byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang / byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the inconceivable power and blessing of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gcig 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gcig 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the inconceivable miracle of the Tathāgata’s body filling all world systems with a single body.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gcig tu zhugs pas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gcig tu zhugs pas /
translated: Because of the Tathāgata’s body being the one body of all tathāgatas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par phye ba thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byin gyi rlabs yongs su ston pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par phye ba thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byin gyi rlabs yongs su ston pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the inconceivable revelation of the blessing of the Buddha-fields, which are all directed to the goal.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par yongs su ston par mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par yongs su ston par mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the inconceivable revelation of the reflection of the entire Dharma-element in a single atom of the Tathagatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ba spu'i bu ga gcig tu sngon gyi mtha' de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yongs su ston par mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ba spu'i bu ga gcig tu sngon gyi mtha' de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yongs su ston par mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the inconceivable revelation of the lineage of the Tathagatas in a single pore of the skin, from one to the other, from the beginning.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'od zer gcig gi sgo nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa snang bar 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'od zer gcig gi sgo nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa snang bar 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the inconceivable revelation of the illumination of the infinite world-realms through a single ray of light of the Tathagatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ba spu'i rtse mo gcig las sprul pa'i @32b sprin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ba spu'i rtse mo gcig las sprul pa'i @32b sprin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the clouds of emanations from a single pore of the Tathagatas fill all buddha-fields, as numerous as the atoms in all the world systems, in an inconceivable way.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ba spu'i sgo gcig nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'du ba dang / 'jig pa'i bskal pa yongs su ston pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ba spu'i sgo gcig nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'du ba dang / 'jig pa'i bskal pa yongs su ston pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the Tathagatas display in a single pore the world systems that are forming and disintegrating in an inconceivable way.

original: ji ltar dze ta'i tshal de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pas yongs su dag par kun nas gnas par gyur pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar dze ta'i tshal de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pas yongs su dag par kun nas gnas par gyur pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as the Jeta Grove was completely filled with pure buddha-fields of that kind,

original: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
translated: in the same way, in all the world systems in the ten directions, as far as the limits of space,

original: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad kyang yongs su dag par kun nas gnas shing rab tu brgyan pa dang / shin tu spud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus yongs su rgyas pa dang / dze ta'i tshal du yang dag par gzhol ba dang /
analyzed: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad kyang yongs su dag par kun nas gnas shing rab tu brgyan pa dang / shin tu spud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus yongs su rgyas pa dang / dze ta'i tshal du yang dag par gzhol ba dang /
translated: the entire realm of space was filled with a pure array, a vast array, an array of the bodies of the tathāgatas, and an array that was directed toward the Jeta Grove.

original: byang chub sems dpas yongs su rgyas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho shin tu rnam par gnas pa dang / rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od kyis rab tu snang ba dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpas yongs su rgyas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho shin tu rnam par gnas pa dang / rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od kyis rab tu snang ba dang /
translated: It was filled with bodhisattvas, with the ocean of the assembly of the retinue of the tathāgatas, with a rain falling from clouds of all adornments, with the light of all jewels,

original: rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / zhing thams cad kyi bkod pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog par brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi lus thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa dang /
analyzed: rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / zhing thams cad kyi bkod pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog par brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi lus thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa dang /
translated: adorned with the rain of clouds of all divine bodies falling down,

original: me tog sna tshogs thams cad @33a *//
analyzed: me tog sna tshogs thams cad @33a *//
translated: adorned with the vast clouds of all kinds of flowers fully blooming,🔽adorned with the rain of the beautiful colors of all kinds of cloth falling from the treasury of clouds of trees of all kinds of cloth,

original: kyi sprin shin tu rgyas pa'i lhun gyis kun tu rgyas shing brgyan pa dang / gos thams cad kyi shing gi sprin gyi mdzod nas gos kha dog sna tshogs su mdzes pa'i char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / phreng ba dang / lda ldi dang /
analyzed: kyi sprin shin tu rgyas pa'i lhun gyis kun tu rgyas shing brgyan pa dang / gos thams cad kyi shing gi sprin gyi mdzod nas gos kha dog sna tshogs su mdzes pa'i char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / phreng ba dang / lda ldi dang /

translated: From all the marks and all the signs of goodness, all the pores of the body, and the entire body, clouds of the forms of the completely pure buddha realms of the three times were emitted.🔽In an instant they filled the realm of phenomena.

original: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas /🔽bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste /

analyzed: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te /

translated: from all the major and minor marks, from all the pores of his body, from his entire body, from all his limbs and all his joints, from all the paths of his speech, from all his clothes and all his undergarments,

translated: from the entire retinue of bodhisattvas, from the Bhagavat Vairocana, from all the tathagatas of the past who reached the limit of the past, from all the tathagatas of the future who will reach the limit of the future, whether predicted or not, and from all the tathagatas of the present who dwell in the infinite buddhafields of the ten directions, from the ocean of their previous deeds connected with the perfection of generosity,

translated: the reflection of all the things that were given and received, the major and minor marks, the pores of the body, the entire body, the major and minor limbs, the paths of the words, the upper and lower garments, and all the ornaments.🔽He also revealed the ocean of past deeds that were connected with the perfection of morality, and he revealed the ocean of past deeds that were connected with the perfection of patience, which was the display of the patience of being cut into pieces.

analyzed: yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad 'thub pa rab tu bstan pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brtson 'grus dang / drag shul dang /
translated: He also revealed the ocean of past deeds that were connected with the perfection of diligence, the perfection of meditation, and the perfection of wisdom of all bodhisattvas.

original: rnam par gnon pa dang @44b ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam gtan rgya mtsho yongs su tshol zhing rab tu bsgrub pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang /
analyzed: rnam par gnon pa dang @44b ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam gtan rgya mtsho yongs su tshol zhing rab tu bsgrub pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang /
translated: the ocean of past deeds of the one who had the power of complete subjugation, which was a great illumination; the ocean of past deeds of the one who had the power of the search for and accomplishment of the ocean of the samādhis of all tathāgatas, which was a great illumination;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul yongs su bsgrub cing chos yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul yongs su bsgrub cing chos yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing /
translated: the ocean of past deeds of the one who had the power of the search for the Dharma and the accomplishment of the turning of the Dharma wheel of all tathāgatas, who had given away all his possessions,

original: shin tu zhe non pa'i lus dang / ngo'i gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par bya bas sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lam la 'gro ba thams cad mngon par mos par byed pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang /
analyzed: shin tu zhe non pa'i lus dang / ngo'i gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par bya bas sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lam la 'gro ba thams cad mngon par mos par byed pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang /
translated: the ocean of his past deeds being revealed by the appearance of the forms of his bodies in the mirror of the sky;🔽the ocean of his past deeds being revealed by the appearance of the vision of all the tathāgatas and the delight of all beings through the path of all bodhisattvas;🔽the ocean of his past deeds being revealed by the appearance of the adornment of the pure gateway of the accomplishment of the ocean of the prayers of all bodhisattvas;

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho mngon par grub pa'i sgo yongs su dag pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu grub pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho mngon par grub pa'i sgo yongs su dag pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu grub pa dang /
translated: the ocean of his past deeds being revealed by the appearance of the accomplishment of the perfection of power of all bodhisattvas;

original: rnam par mngon pa dang / @45a *//🔽rnam par dag par byas pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyi sprin gyis rgyas par bkang ste /
analyzed: rnam par mngon pa dang / @45a *// rnam par dag par byas pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyi sprin gyis rgyas par bkang ste /
translated: the manifestation of the ocean of the past deeds of the bodhisattvas who have purified their conduct,

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa byed cing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa byed cing /
translated: and the manifestation of the ocean of the past deeds of all bodhisattvas endowed with the domain of wisdom,

original: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas /
analyzed: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas /
translated: they came to the Sahā world realm.

original: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste /
translated: They approached the Bhagavat

original: 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas /
analyzed: 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas /
translated: and, together with their retinues, bowed to the Bhagavat.🔽They then remained in the sky above

original: steng gi phyogs su brten te /
analyzed: steng gi phyogs su brten te /
translated: and

original: rdo rje dbang po sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyan gyi snying po can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rdo rje dang / aindra n'i la'i padmo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che thams cad rab tu 'bar ba'i dra bas kun nas brgyan pa dang /
analyzed: rdo rje dbang po sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyan gyi snying po can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rdo rje dang / aindra n'i la'i padmo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che thams cad rab tu 'bar ba'i dra bas kun nas brgyan pa dang /
translated: He emanated palaces with the essence of all kinds of ornaments, lion thrones with the essence of vajras and indranīla lotuses, and the bodies of bodhisattvas wearing jeweled crowns adorned with nets of blazing precious kings of jewels.

original: rin po che'i rgyal po dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang dbyangs su sgrog pa'i phreng ba rab tu 'phyang ba dang / mgo la rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas; skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do ////🔽ba ma po brgyad cu bdun pa /
analyzed: rin po che'i rgyal po dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang dbyangs su sgrog pa'i phreng ba rab tu 'phyang ba dang / mgo la rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas; skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do //// ba ma po brgyad cu bdun pa /
translated: They were draped with garlands of the names and voices of the tathāgatas of the three times, and they sat down cross-legged.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'khor dang bcas par /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'khor dang bcas par /
translated: The eighty-seven bodhisattvas, each with their retinues,

original: byang chub @45b sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyis byung ba /
analyzed: byang chub @45b sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyis byung ba /
translated: He was born from the conduct and prayers of the bodhisattva Samantabhadra.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas zhal du lta ba ye shes yongs su dag pa'i mig dang ldan pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas zhal du lta ba ye shes yongs su dag pa'i mig dang ldan pa /
translated: He had eyes of pure wisdom that looked upon the faces of all the tathagatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang / mdo sde'i tshul gyis gsung rgya mtsho la rna ba yongs su gzhol ba /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang / mdo sde'i tshul gyis gsung rgya mtsho la rna ba yongs su gzhol ba /
translated: He had ears that were intent on the ocean of speech, the Dharma wheels and sutra systems of all the tathagatas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang rab tu thob par bya ba la pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang rab tu thob par bya ba la pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa /
translated: He had attained the supreme perfection of the bodhisattvas’ attainment of the highest power.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dong ba /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dong ba /
translated: He went into the presence of all the tathagatas.

original: skad cig skad cig tu yongs su bstan par rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba /
analyzed: skad cig skad cig tu yongs su bstan par rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba /
translated: He was born from the emanations that were revealed in every instant.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lus gcig gis rgyas par dgang ba'i yul dang ldan pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lus gcig gis rgyas par dgang ba'i yul dang ldan pa /
translated: He had the domain of filling all world systems with a single body.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du lus su mngon par 'byung zhing /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du lus su mngon par 'byung zhing /
translated: They manifested bodies in the retinue of the maṇḍalas of all tathāgatas.

original: rnam par snang ba rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khams gcig tu snang zhing khongs su chud par yang dag par ston pa'i yul dang ldan pa /
analyzed: rnam par snang ba rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khams gcig tu snang zhing khongs su chud par yang dag par ston pa'i yul dang ldan pa /
translated: They had the domain of displaying all world systems in a single atom of light.

original: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i dus la sdod par gzhol ba /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i dus la sdod par gzhol ba / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra /
translated: They were intent on remaining in the world for as long as it takes to ripen and guide all beings.

original: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rab tu sgrog pa'i yul dang ldan pa /
analyzed: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rab tu sgrog pa'i yul dang ldan pa /
translated: They had the domain of the sound of the clouds of the Dharma wheels of all tathāgatas resounding from all their pores.

original: sems can gyi khams thams cad sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes pa rab tu thob pa /
analyzed: sems can gyi khams thams cad sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes pa rab tu thob pa /
translated: They had attained the knowledge that all the realms of beings are like an illusion.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mig yor lta bur khong du chud pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mig yor lta bur khong du chud pa /
translated: They had realized that all tathāgatas are like reflections.

original: @46a *// srid pa'i rgyud du skye ba thams cad rmi lam lta bu shes par byung ba /
analyzed: @46a *// srid pa'i rgyud du skye ba thams cad rmi lam lta bu shes par byung ba /
translated: They had the knowledge that all births in the realms of existence are like dreams.

original: las dang rnam par smin pa thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bur shes pas rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: las dang rnam par smin pa thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bur shes pas rnam par dag pa /
translated: They knew that all actions and their ripening are like reflections.

original: ye shes mngon par grub pa thams cad smig rgyu lta bur mngon par shes pa /
analyzed: ye shes mngon par grub pa thams cad smig rgyu lta bur mngon par shes pa /
translated: They had the higher knowledge that all the accomplishments of wisdom are like mirages.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad sprul pa lta bur khong du chud pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad sprul pa lta bur khong du chud pa /
translated: They had realized that all the infinite world systems are like magical illusions.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa /
translated: They had attained the illumination of the wisdom of the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa'i khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i nga ros rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa'i khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i nga ros rnam par gnon pa /
translated: They had conquered with the lion’s roar of the fearless leader of the herd.

original: tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa /
analyzed: tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa /
translated: They had the knowledge of the different kinds of eloquence.

original: mi zad pa'i rgya mtshor zhugs pa /
analyzed: mi zad pa'i rgya mtshor zhugs pa /
translated: They had entered the ocean of inexhaustibility.

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho dang / chos kyi nges pa'i tshig gi ye shes rab tu thob pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho dang / chos kyi nges pa'i tshig gi ye shes rab tu thob pa /
translated: They had attained the ocean of the languages of all beings and the wisdom of the etymological definitions of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa /
translated: They had the domain of wisdom that is as unattached as the realm of phenomena and space.

original: chos thams cad la bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad la bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa /
translated: They had attained the wisdom that is unobstructed with regard to all phenomena.

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa /
translated: He had the pure maṇḍala of the knowledge of the higher cognitions of all bodhisattvas.

original: bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par dkrug pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa /
analyzed: bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par dkrug pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa /
translated: He had the diligence of the destruction of the maṇḍala of all māras.

original: dus gsum thams cad shes pa'i stobs la rab tu gnas pa /
analyzed: dus gsum thams cad shes pa'i stobs la rab tu gnas pa /
translated: He was established in the power of the knowledge of the three times.

original: chos thams cad la ye shes bsgribs pa med pa rab tu thob pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad la ye shes bsgribs pa med pa rab tu thob pa /
translated: He had attained the unobstructed knowledge of all phenomena.

original: gnas med pas nam mkha'i spyod yul dang ldan pa /
analyzed: gnas med pas nam mkha'i spyod yul dang ldan pa /
translated: He had the domain of space, which is without location.

original: thams @46b cad mkhyen pa'i sa len pa med pa /
analyzed: thams @46b cad mkhyen pa'i sa len pa med pa /
translated: He was without grasping for the level of omniscience.

original: nam mkha' lta bu'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa /
analyzed: nam mkha' lta bu'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa /
translated: He had the diligence of space.

original: srid pa thams cad mi dmigs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul can /
analyzed: srid pa thams cad mi dmigs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul can /
translated: He had the domain of the knowledge that does not apprehend any existence.

original: chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho la rab tu zhugs pa /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho la rab tu zhugs pa /
translated: He had entered the ocean of the way of the entire realm of phenomena.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad tha mi dad pa'i ye shes kyi sgor zhugs pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad tha mi dad pa'i ye shes kyi sgor zhugs pa /
translated: He had entered the door of the knowledge that is not separate from all world systems.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gcig nas gcig tu gzung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gcig nas gcig tu gzung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba /
translated: they had the miraculous manifestation of holding all world systems in their hands;

original: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thams cad du skyes pa'i lus yongs su ston pa /🔽'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dbyibs phra ba dang / rgya che ba dang / yangs pa dang / dog pa sna tshogs rab tu tshogs pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thams cad du skyes pa'i lus yongs su ston pa / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dbyibs phra ba dang / rgya che ba dang / yangs pa dang / dog pa sna tshogs rab tu tshogs pa /
translated: they manifested bodies born in all the world systems;🔽they had the knowledge of the subtle, vast, extensive, and narrow shapes of all world systems;

original: shin tu phra zhing rgya chen po yang dag par gzud pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa /
analyzed: shin tu phra zhing rgya chen po yang dag par gzud pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa /
translated: they had the knowledge of the subtle and vast entry into the world;

original: dmigs pa rgya chen po shin tu phra bar shes pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: dmigs pa rgya chen po shin tu phra bar shes pa dang ldan pa /
translated: they had the knowledge of the subtle and vast perception of objects;

original: sangs rgyas thams cad dang sems kyi skad cig la 'grogs pa rab tu thob pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad dang sems kyi skad cig la 'grogs pa rab tu thob pa /
translated: they had attained the company of all buddhas in a single instant of mind;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa /
translated: they had the body of the wisdom of the blessing of all tathāgatas;

original: phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du mgo rmongs pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa /
analyzed: phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du mgo rmongs pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa /
translated: they had attained the wisdom of not being confused in all the oceans of directions;

original: sems kyi skad cig gis phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par 'gengs pa sha stag ste /
analyzed: sems kyi skad cig gis phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par 'gengs pa sha stag ste /
translated: They were all bodhisattvas who, in a single instant of mind, pervaded the entire ocean of directions with their emanations.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de lta bu'i yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag gis dze ta'i tshal thams cad yongs su rgyas par gyur @47a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de lta bu'i yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag gis dze ta'i tshal thams cad yongs su rgyas par gyur @47a *//
translated: Through the blessing of the Thus-Gone One, the entire Jeta Grove was filled with bodhisattvas endowed with such immeasurable qualities.

original: kyang; nyan thos chen po sh'a ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu dang / 'od srung chen po dang / nam gru dang / rab 'byor dang / 'gag med dang / mos pa dang / ka tya'i bu dang / byams gang gi bu la sogs pas dze ta'i tshal na 'khod bzhin du /
analyzed: kyang; nyan thos chen po sh'a ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu dang / 'od srung chen po dang / nam gru dang / rab 'byor dang / 'gag med dang / mos pa dang / ka tya'i bu dang / byams gang gi bu la sogs pas dze ta'i tshal na 'khod bzhin du /
translated: However, the great hearers Shariputra, Maudgalyayana, Mahakasyapa, Aniruddha, Subhuti, Vakkula, Chudapanthaka, Katyayana, and Purna Maitrayaniputra, who were present in the Jeta Grove,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ngo //
translated: did not see those emanations of the Thus-Gone One.

original: sangs rgyas kyi bkod pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul dang / sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang /🔽sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yang ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi bkod pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul dang / sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yang ma mthong ngo //
translated: the array of the buddhas, the preeminence of the buddhas, the play of the buddhas, the miracles of the buddhas, the great power of the buddhas, the emanations of the conduct of the buddhas,🔽the power of the buddhas, the blessings of the buddhas, and the purified buddha realms.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'dus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas tshogs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' nye bar 'ongs pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'dus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas tshogs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' nye bar 'ongs pa dang /
translated: I did not see the inconceivable domain of the bodhisattvas, the bodhisattvas who had come from afar, the bodhisattvas who had assembled, the bodhisattvas who had gathered, and the bodhisattvas who had approached.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs su 'khod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i seng @47b ge'i khri bkod pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs su 'khod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i seng @47b ge'i khri bkod pa dang /
translated: the bodhisattvas’ miracles, the bodhisattvas’ magical manifestations, the bodhisattvas’ retinues, the bodhisattvas’ positions, the bodhisattvas’ lion thrones,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i khang pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par bsgyings pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i khang pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par bsgyings pa dang /
translated: the bodhisattvas’ palaces, the bodhisattvas’ conduct, the bodhisattvas’ play in samādhi, the bodhisattvas’ gazes, and the bodhisattvas’ displays.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lung bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su smin par gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon du 'dor ba dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lung bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su smin par gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon du 'dor ba dang /
translated: the bodhisattvas’ subjugation, the bodhisattvas’ worship of the tathāgatas, the bodhisattvas’ prophecies, the bodhisattvas’ development of maturity, the bodhisattvas’ going forth,🔽the bodhisattvas’ pure Dharma body, the bodhisattvas’ complete body of wisdom, the bodhisattvas’ perception of the body of aspirations, the bodhisattvas’ accomplishment of the body of form,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi lus rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi lus yongs su rdzogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi lus rnam par dmigs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi lus rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi lus yongs su rdzogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi lus rnam par dmigs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa dang /
translated: and the bodhisattvas’ accomplishment of the body of qualities.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor kha dog mtha' yas pa'i bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa'i sprin kun tu 'gyed pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor kha dog mtha' yas pa'i bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa'i sprin kun tu 'gyed pa dang /
translated: the bodhisattvas’ emission of clouds of emanations,🔽the bodhisattvas’ filling the net of the directions,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs kyi dra ba rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sprul pa yang ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs kyi dra ba rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sprul pa yang ma mthong ngo //
translated: and the bodhisattvas’ emanation of the maṇḍala of conduct.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽dge ba'i rtsa ba mi mtshungs ba'i phyir te /🔽de dag gis ni sngon @48a *//
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / dge ba'i rtsa ba mi mtshungs ba'i phyir te / de dag gis ni sngon @48a *//
translated: Why was that?

original: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags so //
translated: It was because they had not accumulated the roots of merit that would have been the cause for seeing the manifestations of the buddhas.

original: de dag la ni sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tan dang / rgyan yongs su dag pa yang dag par bstan pa ma mdzad do //
analyzed: de dag la ni sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tan dang / rgyan yongs su dag pa yang dag par bstan pa ma mdzad do //
translated: For them, the Blessed Buddhas of the past did not teach the purity of the qualities and adornments of all the Buddha-fields included in the world systems of the ten directions.

original: de dag la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag brjod pa ma mdzad do //
analyzed: de dag la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag brjod pa ma mdzad do //
translated: For them, the Blessed Buddhas did not proclaim the miracles of the Buddhas.

original: de dag gis ni sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe /
analyzed: de dag gis ni sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe /
translated: For, when they were wandering in cyclic existence in the past,

original: sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba ma byas so //
analyzed: sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba ma byas so //
translated: they did not exhort beings to unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment.

original: de dag gis ni gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rab tu bzhag pa ma byas so //
analyzed: de dag gis ni gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rab tu bzhag pa ma byas so //
translated: They did not establish the generation of the spirit of enlightenment in the mental continuum of others.

original: de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin no //
translated: They did not enter into the continuity of the lineage of the Tathagatas.

original: de dag gis ni sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir brtson pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de dag gis ni sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir brtson pa ma yin no //
translated: They do not strive to gather all sentient beings.

original: de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba ma byas so //
analyzed: de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba ma byas so //
translated: They do not encourage bodhisattvas to practice the perfections.

original: de dag gis ni sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe /
analyzed: de dag gis ni sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe /
translated: In the past, when they were wandering in cyclic existence,

original: 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi sa la dmigs pa ma byas so //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi sa la dmigs pa ma byas so //
translated: they did not focus on the wisdom that is superior to all other beings.

original: de dag gis ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar bsags pa ma byas so //
analyzed: de dag gis ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar bsags pa ma byas so //
translated: They did not accumulate the roots of virtue that lead to omniscience.

original: de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs @48b pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma bsgrubs so //
analyzed: de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs @48b pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma bsgrubs so //
translated: They did not accomplish the supramundane roots of virtue of the tathāgatas.

original: de dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa'i mngon par shes pa khong du ma chud do //
analyzed: de dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa'i mngon par shes pa khong du ma chud do //
translated: They did not understand the superknowledges that are emanations in all the pure buddhafields.

original: de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i mig gi lam gyis rnam par dmigs par bya ba 'jig rten las 'das pa thun mong ma yin pa'i byang chub tu dmigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam chen po las byung ba khong du chud
analyzed: de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i mig gi lam gyis rnam par dmigs par bya ba 'jig rten las 'das pa thun mong ma yin pa'i byang chub tu dmigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam chen po las byung ba khong du chud
translated: They understood the roots of goodness that are the focus of the bodhisattvas’ path of vision, which are the focus of the unshared supramundane bodhicitta that arises from the bodhisattvas’ great prayers.

original: do // nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kun gyis ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyi mig gi lam gyis rnam par dmigs pa thun mong ma yin pa /
analyzed: do // nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kun gyis ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyi mig gi lam gyis rnam par dmigs pa thun mong ma yin pa /
translated: The śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas did not understand the unshared path of vision of the bodhisattva Samantabhadra’s wisdom eye,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs las byung ba'i sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i chos nyid kyis grub pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs las byung ba'i sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i chos nyid kyis grub pa /
translated: which is established by the nature of illusion that arises from the blessing of the tathāgatas,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes sna tshogs yongs su 'dzin pa byin gyis rlob pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes sna tshogs yongs su 'dzin pa byin gyis rlob pa /
translated: which blesses the bodhisattvas’ retention of the various perceptions,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba'i shugs chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed pa khong du ma chud do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba'i shugs chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed pa khong du ma chud do //
translated: and which increases the bodhisattvas’ great power of joy.

original: de bas na nyan thos chen po mchog gi zung dang / bzang po'i zung la sogs pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba de mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: de bas na nyan thos chen po mchog gi zung dang / bzang po'i zung la sogs pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba de mi mthong ngo //
translated: Therefore, the great śrāvakas, the foremost pair, the excellent pair, and so forth, did not see that miracle of the Tathāgata.

original: mi thos so //🔽mi shes so //🔽khong du mi chud do //
analyzed: mi thos so // mi shes so // khong du mi chud do //
translated: They did not hear it.🔽They did not understand it.

original: mi rtogs so //
analyzed: mi rtogs so //
translated: They did not comprehend it.🔽They did not realize it.

original: mi rig go /
analyzed: mi rig go /
translated: They did not know it.

original: yid mi ches so //
analyzed: yid mi ches so //
translated: They did not believe it.

original: mi sems so //🔽rnam par mi lta'o //🔽rtogs par mi lta'o //
analyzed: mi sems so // rnam par mi lta'o // rtogs par mi lta'o //
translated: They did not think about it.🔽They did not look at it.

original: nges par mi lta'o //
analyzed: nges par mi lta'o //
translated: They did not look at it with understanding.🔽They did not look at it with certainty.

original: nye bar mi sems so //
analyzed: nye bar mi sems so //
translated: They did not think about it.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul te /🔽nyan thos kyi spyod @49a *//
analyzed: de ni sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul te / nyan thos kyi spyod @49a *//
translated: That is the domain of the buddhas.

original: yul ma yin no //
analyzed: yul ma yin no //
translated: It is not the domain of the śrāvakas.

original: de bas na nyan thos chen po de dag dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang /
analyzed: de bas na nyan thos chen po de dag dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang /
translated: Therefore, although those great śrāvakas were in Jetavana,

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mi mthong ste /
translated: they did not see those miracles of the Buddha.

analyzed: de dag la de dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba med do //
translated: They did not have the roots of virtue that would accord with that.

analyzed: de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong du /

analyzed: de lta bu'i ye shes kyi mig rnam par ma dag go /
translated: The eye of wisdom is not completely purified.

analyzed: khong du chud par bya ba'am /

analyzed: rtogs par bya ba'am /

analyzed: rgyas par dgang bar bya ba'am /

analyzed: 'jug par bya ba'am /

analyzed: rnam par blta ba'am /
translated: observed,

analyzed: nyams su myong bar bya ba'am /
translated: experienced,🔽subdued,

analyzed: gnan ba'am / rnam par mnan pa'am /

analyzed: smos par bya ba'am /

analyzed: yang dag par bstan par bya ba'am / bstab par bya ba'am /

analyzed: sbyin par bya ba'am /

analyzed: de la sems can rnams yongs su bskul bar bya ba'am /

analyzed: sbyar bar bya ba'am /🔽rab tu dgod par bya ba'am /
translated: applied,🔽and established in it.

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i chos nyid la sems can dgod par bya bar yang de dag la de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa med do //

analyzed: de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul med do //

analyzed: de lta bu khyu mchog gi mthu med do // de lta bu'i stobs med do //

analyzed: de lta bu'i dbang med do //

original: de lta bu'i gnas med do //
analyzed: de lta bu'i gnas med do //
translated: They do not have that kind of place.

original: de lta bu'i 'du shes med do //
analyzed: de lta bu'i 'du shes med do //
translated: They do not have that kind of perception.

original: de lta bu'i mig gi mthu @49b med do //
analyzed: de lta bu'i mig gi mthu @49b med do //

original: de lta bu'i ye shes med do //
analyzed: de lta bu'i ye shes med do //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: de dag ni de ltar nyan thos kyi theg pas byung ba /🔽nyan thos kyi lam gyis yongs su grub pa /
analyzed: de dag ni de ltar nyan thos kyi theg pas byung ba / nyan thos kyi lam gyis yongs su grub pa /
translated: They have come forth through the vehicle of the śrāvakas.🔽They have been perfected by the path of the śrāvakas.

original: nyan thos kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa /
translated: They have completed the domain of the conduct of the śrāvakas.

original: nyan thos kyi 'bras bu la gnas pa /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi 'bras bu la gnas pa /
translated: They abide in the result of the śrāvakas.

original: bden pa snang ba shes pas nges par rtogs pa /
analyzed: bden pa snang ba shes pas nges par rtogs pa /
translated: They have realized the knowledge of the appearance of the truths.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa /
translated: They abide in the limit of reality.

original: shin tu zhi ba'i mthar thug pa /
analyzed: shin tu zhi ba'i mthar thug pa /
translated: They have reached the ultimate peace.

original: snying rje chen po'i bsam pa med pa /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i bsam pa med pa /
translated: They were without the intention of great compassion.

original: 'jig rten thams cad la mi lta mi sdod pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad la mi lta mi sdod pa /
translated: They did not look at or dwell on the whole world.

original: rang gi don grub pa dag ste /
analyzed: rang gi don grub pa dag ste /
translated: They had accomplished their own goal.

original: de dag ni dze ta'i tshal de nyid du kun nas 'dus te 'khod la /
analyzed: de dag ni dze ta'i tshal de nyid du kun nas 'dus te 'khod la /
translated: They had all gathered together in Jetavana and were seated there.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga dang / g-yas g-yon dang / snam logs na bcom ldan 'das la mngon du lta bar gnas kyang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga dang / g-yas g-yon dang / snam logs na bcom ldan 'das la mngon du lta bar gnas kyang /
translated: They were in front of the Bhagavat, to his right and left, and behind him, but

original: dze ta'i tshal der sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong bar ma gyur to //
analyzed: dze ta'i tshal der sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong bar ma gyur to //
translated: they did not see those manifestations of the Buddha in Jetavana.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na; thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par ma bsgrubs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par ma bsdus pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la yang dag par ma zhugs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la smon lam yang dag par ma btab pa dang /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na; thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par ma bsgrubs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par ma bsdus pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la yang dag par ma zhugs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la smon lam yang dag par ma btab pa dang /
translated: Why was that? Because they had not accomplished the wisdom of omniscience, had not gathered the wisdom of omniscience, had not entered the wisdom of omniscience, had not made prayers for the wisdom of omniscience,

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par ma bsgrubs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su ma bsgoms pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma sbyangs pa de dag gis ni /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa de la 'jug @50a *//
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par ma bsgrubs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su ma bsgoms pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma sbyangs pa de dag gis ni / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa de la 'jug @50a *//
translated: and who have not trained in the wisdom of omniscience🔽are unable to enter into,🔽understand,

original: cing rtogs par bya ba'am /🔽blta zhing khong du chud par bya bar mi nus so //
analyzed: cing rtogs par bya ba'am / blta zhing khong du chud par bya bar mi nus so //
translated: or comprehend the Tathāgata’s miraculous samādhi.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' rigs dang ldan pa rnams kyi mig gi lam gyis blta ba yin gyi /
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' rigs dang ldan pa rnams kyi mig gi lam gyis blta ba yin gyi /
translated: It is because it is seen by the eye of the bodhisattvas who possess the family,

original: nyan thos kyi mig gis blta ba ma yin no //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi mig gis blta ba ma yin no //
translated: but it is not seen by the eye of the śrāvakas.

original: de bas na nyan thos chen po de dag dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang /
analyzed: de bas na nyan thos chen po de dag dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang /

original: nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun snying po byang chub la mngon du gyur pa'i gnas bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun snying po byang chub la mngon du gyur pa'i gnas bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste /
translated: the expression of the bodhisattva saṅgha of the maṇḍala of the retinue of the tathāgatas in all buddha realms throughout the realm of space, which is to say,

original: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar sprul pa /
analyzed: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar sprul pa /

analyzed: ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sems skad cig la rab tu dgye zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par dgang ba bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste /
translated: He displayed the instant arising of mind from all the pores of his body, filling the realm of phenomena.

analyzed: phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho gzhi mnyam par byin gyis brlab cing /
translated: He displayed the blessing of the entire ocean of world realms in the ocean of all directions as a single buddha realm.

original: lus gcig gis rgyas par dgang ba bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste /🔽dmigs pa'i gzhi thams cad la sangs rgyas kyis rnam par sprul pa dus gsum thams cad yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ba'i byin gyi rlabs yang dag par bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: lus gcig gis rgyas par dgang ba bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste / dmigs pa'i gzhi thams cad la sangs rgyas kyis rnam par sprul pa dus gsum thams cad yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ba'i byin gyi rlabs yang dag par bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste /
translated: He displayed the filling of the entire realm of phenomena with a single body.🔽He displayed the blessing of the emanations of all buddhas in all the bases of perception being directed to the three times.

original: zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams la /
analyzed: zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams la /
translated: He displayed the emanations of all the buddhas of the three times in the atoms of all realms.

original: dus gsum gyi zhing gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / bskal pa rgya mtsho yongs su bshad cing bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: dus gsum gyi zhing gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / bskal pa rgya mtsho yongs su bshad cing bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste /
translated: He displayed the teaching and explanation of the ocean of kalpas in the succession of the buddhas from one realm to another in the three times.

analyzed: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas @63b rab tu brjod pa phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis brlabs pas / byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'byung ba bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste /
translated: and the ocean of the aspirations of the buddhas of the three times were proclaimed from all the pores of his body.

original: chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i seng ge'i khri dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i snying po'i rgyan tha mi dad pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa tha dad pa rab tu bskor pa phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis brlab pa bstan pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i seng ge'i khri dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i snying po'i rgyan tha mi dad pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa tha dad pa rab tu bskor pa phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis brlab pa bstan pa'o //
translated: He revealed the teaching of the arising of the bodhisattvas and he revealed the blessing of the future of the different turning of the wheel of the Dharma, the lion throne equal to the realm of phenomena, the circle of the assembly of bodhisattvas, and the adornment of the essence of the bodhisattvas.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /

analyzed: de ltar seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la bstan pa bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa shin tu bstan pa /

analyzed: sangs rgyas rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de /

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /

analyzed: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul lo //

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid kyi don gyi phyogs bstan pa'i phyir /
